description: A local lord has built a fortress to defend his lands from revolting peasants.

name: An unknown benefactor donated

name: An unknown benefactor donated
description: An unknown benefactor donated a gold statue crafted in the honor of ##goddisname## to the local temple. Placing it outside the temple has increased faith and order.

name: Peasants speak of ill omens an
description: Peasants speak of ill omens and strange creatures that prowl the forests at night. A handful of death gems have been found in the belly of a goat.

name: A witch was drowned in the wel
description: A witch was drowned in the well of a village. Thereafter the water has started glowing in the moonlight. This esoteric substance has been distilled into a large quantity of gems.

name: Priests of the temple have fou
description: Priests of the temple have found ancient and forgotten vaults containing rich offerings.

name: A gold nugget of legendary siz
description: A gold nugget of legendary size has been found and brought to the treasury.

name: A peasants goose has laid seve
description: A peasants goose has laid several eggs of gold! Unfortunately it was killed in an ensuing conflict of ownership. The gold eggs were confiscated by the local temple.

name: A peasant's oyster has produce
description: A peasant's oyster has produced several giant pearls! Unfortunately the oyster was smashed in an ensuing conflict of ownership. The pearls were confiscated by the local temple.

name: Adventurers have plundered the
description: Adventurers have plundered the lair of a hideous troll. Their leader has been hanged and all unlawfully acquired goods have been confiscated.

name: The local merchants guild has
description: The local merchants guild has erected a glorious temple in the honor of ##godname##. Unfortunately costs were higher than expected and tax money had to be used for the last fittings. Consequently the province has not been able to pay any tax this month.

name: The skull of a legendary mage
description: The skull of a legendary mage has been unearthed and transported to the lab. [Skull Mentor]

name: A limping man in a black coat
description: A limping man in a black coat has appeared at the gates of the local stronghold. He offered a deal to anyone willing to sign his contract in blood. ##fulltargname## signed it, unable to resist the temptation. [Soul Contract]

name: An adventurer returning from r
description: An adventurer returning from ruins deep in the mountains has returned insane, carrying a magical lantern that the lord of the land immediately sent to the treasury. [Lightless Lantern]

name: An adventurer returning from t
description: An adventurer returning from the deep seas has returned insane, carrying a magical lantern that the lord of the land immediately sent to the treasury. [Lightless Lantern]

name: A cunning wizard has donated a
description: A cunning wizard has donated a magical object to the local lord in return for protection against the superstitious peasantry. It was immediately transported to the treasury.

name: Much of the recent unrest was
description: Much of the recent unrest was probably caused by an unpopular local baron. He was executed and wealth including a magic item was confiscated.

name: The construction of a new ring
description: The construction of a new ring wall to defend a major city is complete. People from near and far are gathering to seek comfort and commerce in the city. Tax revenues have been permanently increased.

name: One of your administrators fea
description: One of your administrators fears a revolution.

name: A prudent administrator fears
description: A prudent administrator fears your neighbors.

name: One of your bailiffs is afraid
description: One of your bailiffs is afraid of monsters.

name: An annoying leprechaun was cap
description: An annoying leprechaun was captured by a simple cobbler who sold him to you for a little gold. When persuaded with burning iron, the leprechaun revealed the location of his treasure trove. A magic item and a pile of gold coins were found underneath a dung heap.

name: A great treasure has been foun
description: A great treasure has been found! A fortune in gold, one magic item and a huge amount of magic gems have been found and transported to the arcane laboratory.

name: A great treasure has been foun
description: A great treasure has been found! A fortune in gold, magic items and a huge amount of magic gems have been found and transported to the arcane laboratory.

name: A great treasure has been foun
description: A great treasure has been found! A fortune in gold, magic items and a huge amount of magic gems have been found and transported to the arcane laboratory.

name: A great caravan from a distant
description: A great caravan from a distant land arrived in the province. Merchants from far and wide gathered and there was much commerce.

name: A great market was held in the
description: A great market was held in the province. Merchants from far and wide gathered and there was much commerce.

name: Ravagus, the Master of Flames,
description: Ravagus, the Master of Flames, has sent his man-born son to serve you. In return he expects you to set the world on fire.

name: A helpful necromancer has deci
description: A helpful necromancer has decided to aid you. He brought his soulless minions with him.

name: Rumors of your reputation and
description: Rumors of your reputation and promises of an eternal afterlife has caused an amazon priestess from a distant land to lead her tribe to you. In return for service. They expect you to display your mastery over death itself.

name: One of your commanders found a
description: One of your commanders found an old dungeon guarded by strange seals. After days of arcane studies, the seals were broken and a wizened old man was released. The old lore master gratefully accepted you as his new master in return for his freedom.

name: Your path to ascension has bee
description: Your path to ascension has been foreseen at the Grey Tower of Nexus and one of the Shadow Seers has been given the task of guiding you.

name: One of your gardeners has been
description: One of your gardeners has been feeding the royal gardens with the blood of animals and condemned criminals. Unaware of the danger to himself, he entered the tainted garden and was killed by the awakened vines. For a week no one dared enter the gardens, but then a strange wanderer of the woods arrived and proclaimed that he would tame the garden, should he be made royal gardener. Now, both he and the dark vines serve you with the strength of the bloodthirsty wild.

name: A fugitive from the hidden kin
description: A fugitive from the hidden kingdom of Elludia has arrived in your capital. He brings with him a handful of diamonds and swears to serve if you protect him from his former masters.

name: An emissary from the Shadow Se
description: An emissary from the Shadow Seers of Nexus has arrived in the province. He brings you three gifts from the hidden tower: Astral pearls, a magic item and a pot filled with gold coins.

name: An enormously wealthy prince f
description: An enormously wealthy prince from a distant land arrived in your province searching for his beloved lady. Unfortunately for him, he was infected by the plague and died in your care. His riches, a fortune in gold and a number of magic items, were confiscated and transported to your treasury.

name: Oleg, an incredibly old alchem
description: Oleg, an incredibly old alchemist working in one of your laboratories has managed to construct a huge device that transforms base metals into gold. Unfortunately, he died from heart attack when the device actually worked. The device is operational and produces huge amounts of gold each month.

name: An unnatural plague has swept
description: An unnatural plague has swept the province, killing thousands. Magical gems were found in the decaying corpses. Rumors of the mythical Crown of Darkness have circulated in the province ever since.

name: Caspar of the Cave has arrived
description: Caspar of the Cave has arrived in your province and told you where to find the deepest cave in the province. Unfortunately he also awakened some strange beings in the deeps.

name: A young scholar has discovered
description: A young scholar has discovered the tomb of an ancient king.

name: The tomb of an ancient priest-
description: The tomb of an ancient priest-king was discovered.

name: An old scholar has discovered
description: An old scholar has discovered the tomb of an ancient hero, holding ancient treasures.

name: The tomb of an ancient king wa
description: The tomb of an ancient king was discovered by a young scholar. Ignoring the glyphs of warning, he entered the tomb and claimed an artifact of old. Unfortunately, he also released the guardians of the tomb!.

name: A wealthy merchant has found s
description: A wealthy merchant has found salvation and donated a huge sum of gold to the temple.

name: A wealthy merchant has been su
description: A wealthy merchant has been suffering from a dread disease and donated all his gold to get rid of the affliction.

name: A wealthy and faithful noble h
description: A wealthy and faithful noble has died from old age and willed his fortunes to ##disname##. The gold was collected by the temple.

name: A tribal king from a distant l
description: A tribal king from a distant land has donated a golden plow and a magic item to ##disname##.

name: There was a trade boom in the
description: There was a trade boom in the province.

name: A great fertility festival was
description: A great fertility festival was celebrated in the province.

name: A great summer festival was ce
description: A great summer festival was celebrated in the province.

name: A great harvest festival was c
description: A great harvest festival was celebrated in the province. Faith has increased and bumper harvests are expected.

name: Instead of falling off, the le
description: Instead of falling off, the leaves on an ancient oak turned into gems.

name: Midwinter was celebrated in th
description: Midwinter was celebrated in the province.

name: One cold winter night there wa
description: One cold winter night there was a storm. A man with a frozen beard and robes of silver and ice emerged. He claimed to be the last of his order and now he wishes to serve the one whose dominion is ice and darkness.

name: An old hut was found in a deep
description: An old hut was found in a deep forest. The owner, an old animist, preferred to serve rather than being staked in a bog.

name: The cousin of a local lord has
description: The cousin of a local lord has been bitten by a werewolf and now wishes your protection from the superstitious peasantry. He has donated his gold to the treasury.

name: A vampire that has been rooted
description: A vampire that has been rooted out of his nest by local fanatics now seeks your protection.

name: A Vampire Count has been drive
description: A Vampire Count has been driven from his lands by local fanatics and now seeks your protection.

name: Gold deposits have been found
description: Gold deposits have been found and a new mine is being built.

name: Gold deposits have been found
description: Gold deposits have been found and a new mine is being built.

name: An old tower surrounded by wis
description: An old tower surrounded by wisps of mist was found on a high mountaintop. The owner of the tower agreed to help you for a small sum of gold and a couple of virgins.

name: A large amount of magic gems h
description: A large amount of magic gems have floated ashore in this province.

name: A slave ship has been discover
description: A slave ship has been discovered and the cargo confiscated. Several virgins were transported to your blood slave dungeons.

name: A pirate ship has been discove
description: A pirate ship has been discovered and the cargo confiscated.

name: A wayward siren was found by a
description: A wayward siren was found by a lonely fisherman. He helped her mend her broken wing and gained her trust. Being a man of faith, he converted her and she is now willing to serve ##disname##.

name: A sunken ship filled with trea
description: A sunken ship filled with treasure has been discovered in a deep gorge. All its wealth has been transported to your treasury.

name: A black sunken ship has been d
description: A black sunken ship has been discovered in a deep gorge. The ship contained a huge amount of magic gems and two magic items.

name: A large amount of magic water
description: A large amount of magic water gems has been found in the deeps.

name: A triton prince has come to yo
description: A triton prince has come to you in search of the fabled Orb of Atlantis. He was so impressed by your wondrous palaces that he and his retinue swore their allegiance to you.

name: A hydromancer from the Academy
description: A hydromancer from the Academy Underneath has arrived with great gifts. He is on a secret mission, but has agreed to help you.

name: A triton mage from the Forest
description: A triton mage from the Forest of Amber Kelp has arrived with his menagerie. He was attacked by sea trolls and is now seeking refuge in your lands.

name: An envoy from the Cerulean Mah
description: An envoy from the Cerulean Maharajah has arrived with sad news. The Maharajah is dying and his one hundred and seven sons are gathering to attend his funeral. One of your Cerulean Warriors has left your service, apparently being one of the heirs. In gratitude he left a bag of gold for your treasury and his personal advisor to serve you.

name: Azazel has sired an offspring.
description: Azazel has sired an offspring.

name: Semyaza has sired an offspring
description: Semyaza has sired an offspring.

name: Ezekiel has sired an offspring
description: Ezekiel has sired an offspring.

name: Shamshiel has sired an offspri
description: Shamshiel has sired an offspring.

name: Kokabel has sired an offspring
description: Kokabel has sired an offspring.

name: Arakiel has sired an offspring
description: Arakiel has sired an offspring.

name: One of your Melqarts has reali
description: One of your Melqarts has realized the power inherent in the blood of his brethren. Inviting a Ba'al to a grisly banquet, he slew his guest and feasted upon his heart to gain power.

name: One of your Zamzummim and an A
description: One of your Zamzummim and an Adon have organized a great banquet for Ditan, greatest of the deified Rephaite Lords. By sacrificing himself at the feast, the Zamzummite has traded life for life and passed into Sheol, allowing Ditan and his assembly to manifest in the world of the living.

name: One of your eunuchs has miracu
description: One of your eunuchs has miraculously fathered a child. Faith in your healing powers has increased.

name: One of your Ceremonial Masters
description: One of your Ceremonial Masters has interpreted the ceremonial calendar of the Ministry.

name: One of your Ministers has inte
description: One of your Ministers has interpreted the signs and made a remarkably accurate calendar for the province.

name: One of your Ministers has inte
description: One of your Ministers has interpreted the signs and made a remarkably accurate calendar for the province.

name: One of your Ministers has inte
description: One of your Ministers has interpreted the signs and made a remarkably accurate calendar for the province. Order was brought to the troubled province.

name: Farbaute has organized a great
description: Farbaute has organized a great drinking contest and champions from near and far are gathering to show off.

name: A handful of black onis were m
description: A handful of black onis were molesting a group of red onis and refused to stop. Not until Tsunekage slew one of the black onis and ate his heart did they stop. Another group of red onis witnessed the event and joined your army.

name: Daidalos, the great inventor,
description: Daidalos, the great inventor, Maker of the Maze, has unveiled his latest masterpiece, an army of mechanical servants. A clever engineer quickly found a use for the servants and placed armaments in their hands.

name: The Mother of Monsters has giv
description: The Mother of Monsters has given birth.

name: Angerboda, the Great Hag, moth
description: Angerboda, the Great Hag, mother of monsters, has given birth to a great serpent of exceptional cunning.

name: Angerboda, the Great Hag, moth
description: Angerboda, the Great Hag, mother of monsters, has given birth to a great wolf of exceptional cunning.

name: Klaus has convinced the Empero
description: Klaus has convinced the Emperor of Pythium that he needs further funding to conquer the Underworld. The Emerald Emperor sent a Pythian legion and a chest filled with gold to strengthen the human position in the Underworld.

name: In her misery and solitude, De
description: In her misery and solitude, Delgnat, the last Partholonian, has reenacted the last battle of Sera, her father. Some of the corpses reanimated for the charade were not destroyed and have been put to other use.

name: A brigand leader and his follo
description: A brigand leader and his followers have been rounded up and delivered to one of your bailiffs by a striking woman astride a unicorn. Peasants are now able to toil the land again.

name: One of your Knights of the Sto
description: One of your Knights of the Stone has embarked upon a quest and returned with enchanted treasure.

name: One of your Knights of the Sto
description: One of your Knights of the Stone has embarked upon a quest. In a deep forest he met an enchantress of great power, fell in love with her and wooed her for a month. Being quite lonely, she grew fond of him and accepted his offer of marriage.

name: A wave of religious zeal has s
description: A wave of religious zeal has swept the province and a group of lowborn soldiers committed to your cause has joined your armies.

name: Your troubled province has bee
description: Your troubled province has been terrorized by a group of renegade ronin. Fortunately an influential and wise kannushi convinced the bandits to quit the meaningless slaughter and fight where there is honor.

name: Rumors of your might have swep
description: Rumors of your might have swept the province and a group of loud-mouthed bakemono-sho praising your greatness has joined your armies.

name: Rumors of your might have swep
description: Rumors of your might have swept the province and a group of loud-mouthed bakemono-sho praising your greatness has joined your armies.

name: A wave of religious zeal has s
description: A wave of religious zeal has swept the province and a group of warriors committed to your cause has joined your armies.

name: A wave of religious zeal has s
description: A wave of religious zeal has swept the province and a group of villagers committed to your cause has joined your armies.

name: A wave of religious zeal has s
description: A wave of religious zeal has swept the province and a group of lowborn soldiers committed to your cause has joined your armies.

name: A wave of religious zeal has s

description: Merchants have established themselves in your temple. Faith is decreasing, but the merchants prosper.

name: People are starting to worship
description: People are starting to worship false pretenders in the secrecy of their homes.

description: Your temple has been vandalized, several statues have been smashed.

name: Suddenly Bogus and his fellow
description: Suddenly Bogus and his fellow adventurers decided to aid an old wise man whose daughter was held captive by your blood mages. The young girl and a couple of other blood slaves were liberated in a daring attack on your dungeon.

description: A huge barbarian horde has unexpectedly attacked and pillaged the province.

name: Magic is fading.
description: Magic is fading.

name: A large group of non faithfuls
description: A large group of non faithfuls have decided to emigrate. Part of the population has left their homes in search of a better place to live and faith has increased in the rightful god, ##godname##.

description: A fairy court of summer has been traveling through the land. Growth and luck have increased but frolicking peasants have left the fields untended, causing a fall in productivity.

description: A heatwave has struck the land. Drought is expected

description: A hurricane has struck the land, devastating the countryside.

description: Temperatures are rising and the very ground seems to burn with unnatural heat. Many have died from the scorching heat and widespread wildfires.

name: The temperature has dropped dr
description: The temperature has dropped dramatically and blizzards have devastated the land. Many have died from starvation.

name: A superstitious lord has roote
description: A superstitious lord has rooted out witches, wizards, mongrels, strangers and half-wits. All have been put to the pyre. Magic has decreased and a substantial portion of the populace has been lost.

name: War has broken out among the l
description: War has broken out among the lords of the land. There is great turmoil and a large part of the population has been killed or fled.

name: The weather is getting increas
description: The weather is getting increasingly colder and an unseasonal winter is expected.

name: The temperature has dropped co
description: The temperature has dropped considerably and the winter is going to be the coldest ever!

name: Frost has destroyed the crops.
description: Frost has destroyed the crops. Starvation is expected.

name: Rain has been pouring down and
description: Rain has been pouring down and the entire province is severely flooded.

description: Enemies of the faith have destroyed the holy temple.

description: A small but powerful shambler society has decided to take control of the province.

description: A lonely Hydra is terrorizing the province. At night it shrieks in agonized solitude.

description: An enormous tidal wave has hit. Everyone living near the shore has died. People are very distraught.

name: A Troll King has unexpectedly
description: A Troll King has unexpectedly attacked.

name: Some ancient Power has been di
description: Some ancient Power has been disturbed, turning everyone in the province into mindless plant beings!

name: The Dark Slumber has befallen
description: The Dark Slumber has befallen a village in the woods. The villagers disappeared during the night, but soon emerged from the woods reanimated by roots and vines.

name: A malicious druid and his comp
description: A malicious druid and his companions are trying to take control of the land!

name: A malicious druid and his comp
description: A malicious druid and his companions are trying to take control of the land! Their aim is to restore it to growth and health.

name: Realizing the power of the bea
description: Realizing the power of the beautiful and ever growing nature, the entire female population of this province has gone into a frenzy of Pangaean worship!

name: A group of huge Scorpion Beast
description: A group of huge Scorpion Beasts are terrorizing the province.

name: A Gadite rebel has managed to
description: A Gadite rebel has managed to sneak past your temple guard and set the temple ablaze. An Abysian conspiracy is suspected.

name: A Gadite rebel has managed to
description: A Gadite rebel has managed to sneak past your temple guard and set some of your blood slaves free.

name: The people in the province hav
description: The people in the province have been awakened by the holy power of Marignon. They are now in a fanatic state and kill everything undead.

name: A group of drunken Yamabushi p
description: A group of drunken Yamabushi picked a fight with some of your Sohei. After a vicious brawl, one Sohei and one Yamabushi were dead.

name: One of your Revelers was found
description: One of your Revelers was found and slain by a Serpent Assassin.

name: One of your Epoptes was found
description: One of your Epoptes was found and slain by a Serpent Assassin.

name: One of your Heliodromii was fo
description: One of your Heliodromii was found and slain by a Serpent Assassin.

name: One of your Kohanim has discov
description: One of your Kohanim has discovered an Abba in his army camp. The heretic was quickly caught and stoned to death.

name: A Melqart of prodigious appeti
description: A Melqart of prodigious appetite has devoured one of your Rephaites.

name: A Rephaite of prodigious appet
description: A Rephaite of prodigious appetite has devoured an Avvite charioteer along with his horses.

name: The chains of your Juggernaut
description: The chains of your Juggernaut burst when it was being pulled uphill. It accidentally crushed a young member of the militia. The event was seen as an evil omen and faith in ##godname## has decreased.

name: Suddenly the Roc swooped down
description: Suddenly the Roc swooped down and flew away with one of your elephants.

name: The Dragon couldn't control hi
description: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger and has eaten a handful of your blood slaves.

name: The Dragon couldn't control hi
description: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger and has eaten a handful of your blood slaves.

name: The Dragon couldn't control hi
description: The Dragon couldn't control his hunger and has eaten a handful of your blood slaves.

name: The wailing of the blood fount
description: The wailing of the blood fountain has driven part of the population insane. Ten percent of the population has died.

name: SkÃ¶gu was struck by a fell mo
description: SkÃ¶gu was struck by a fell mood and held a grisly banquet in honor of himself. The guests feasted upon some of your blood slaves.

name: Having waited for hundreds of
description: Having waited for hundreds of years, SkÃ¶gu was finally approached by his former lover. Filled with rage and lust and hunger, he slew her, ate her and mourned her by killing a significant part of the population.

name: Sporsnjall and his wolf riders
description: Sporsnjall and his wolf riders have ravished women all around the province. Your bailiffs suggest that you patrol the province to find the culprit.

name: Sporsnjall and his wolf riders
description: Sporsnjall and his wolf riders have burned crop fields all around the province. Your bailiffs suggest that you patrol the province to find the culprit.

name: Cattle all around the province
description: Cattle all around the province is being attacked by wolves. Rumors claim that Sporsnjall, the Wolf Lord, is causing the trouble. Your bailiffs suggest that you patrol the province to find the culprit.

name: Your farmers have angered a ve
description: Your farmers have angered a vengeful entity of the wild. A monster boar is now ravaging the province. Farmers are afraid to enter their fields and refuse to work. Unrest is slowly growing. You must send a group of hunters to find the dire pig and slay it lest unrest will continue to rise.

name: Horrible dreams of vivisection
description: Horrible dreams of vivisections and children flayed by their mothers are afflicting the population. Fear of a horror infestation is causing widespread panic.

name: A major disturbance in the Ast
description: A major disturbance in the Astral Plane has resulted in a wave of magic overflowing into the world.

name: A major disturbance in the Ast
description: A major disturbance in the Astral Plane has resulted in a wave of magic overflowing into the world.

name: The moon turned red for a nigh
description: The moon turned red for a night, an omen of misfortune. Luck has decreased worldwide.

name: One night there were three moo
description: One night there were three moons, an omen of great fortune to come. Luck has increased worldwide.

name: During nighttime green lights
description: During nighttime green lights can be seen dancing in the sky and mages have reported a worldwide surge of magic.

name: For unknown reasons magic seem
description: For unknown reasons magic seems to be leaking from the world.

name: A cluster of five stars could
description: A cluster of five stars could be seen shining more brightly than usual for a week. This is interpreted as an omen of good luck and fertility.

name: The climate has grown unnatura
description: The climate has grown unnaturally cold. People fear the Rimtursar are awakening. Unrest has increased worldwide.

name: The sun seems to have grown la
description: The sun seems to have grown larger and the climate unnaturally warm. Unrest has increased worldwide.

name: The moon hangs ripe and pregna
description: The moon hangs ripe and pregnant in the sky. The fields and orchards share their bounties before the coming winter.

name: The stars are right for conjur
description: The stars are right for conjurations.

name: The stars are right for altera
description: The stars are right for alterations.

name: The stars are right for evocat
description: The stars are right for evocations.

name: The stars are right for constr
description: The stars are right for constructions.

name: The stars are right for enchan
description: The stars are right for enchantments.

name: The stars are right for thauma
description: The stars are right for thaumaturgy.

name: The stars are right for blood
description: The stars are right for blood magic.

name: The cold is unusually harsh th
description: The cold is unusually harsh this winter.

name: The heat is unusually severe t
description: The heat is unusually severe this summer.

name: Word is spreading that Astrolo
description: Word is spreading that Astrologers have spotted a comet headed straight for Earth!

name: A comet can be seen clearly in
description: A comet can be seen clearly in the sky, heading straight for Earth. Panic is spreading worldwide.

name: The comet has struck ##landnam
description: The comet has struck ##landname##! The impact could be seen from the other side of the world. Luckily it hit in a remote area and even though half the province was devastated, most of the population survived. [Huge Crater]

name: The comet has struck ##landnam
description: The comet has struck ##landname##! The impact could be seen from the other side of the world. The province has been devastated and most of the population annihilated. [Huge Crater]

name: For a single day all water had
description: For a single day all water had a tone of red, as if tainted by blood. This is obviously a very bad omen and unrest has increased worldwide.

name: The most malicious stars are a
description: The most malicious stars are ascendant. The celestial spheres are disturbed by singularly bad omens. The night winds carry gibbering messages from the cruel stars. The insane call out names they should not know and spiders spin webs in patterns that should not be.

name: A forgotten decree of the Pant
description: A forgotten decree of the Pantokrator has suddenly taken effect. The decree of the almighty fills the usurper gods and their minions with terror. Faith in the new weakling gods is diminished all over the world.

name: A strange dark rent has appear
description: A strange dark rent has appeared in the sky. Hope, Wonder and Magic drains away through it.

name: Strange occurrences plague all
description: Strange occurrences plague all lands. Children are being born with two heads, pots of gold are found laying about, hurricanes strike the coasts and strange and terrible beasts emerge to haunt the land.

name: An ancient treasure has been u
description: An ancient treasure has been unearthed!

name: An ancient treasure has been u
description: An ancient treasure has been unearthed!

name: A sunken treasure has been fou
description: A sunken treasure has been found!

name: A witch was caught. While suff
description: A witch was caught. While suffering her sentence of death by lapidation, she uttered a dark curse over the land.

name: A triton witch master was caug
description: A triton witch master was caught. While suffering his sentence of death staked on the shore of an island, he uttered a dark curse over the land.

name: A martyr has died. The faithfu
description: A martyr has died. The faithful rejoice and flock to the temple.

name: A warlock has been caught red-
description: A warlock has been caught red-handed. His virgin followers are now kept in your dungeon.

name: Nature gems have been distille
description: Nature gems have been distilled from the droppings of a magical beast.

name: The local lawgiver has caught
description: The local lawgiver has caught a traitor. After summary trial and execution his belongings have been confiscated.

name: A local wizard was found conso
description: A local wizard was found consorting with demons and -far worse- with rival nations. The foreign agent has been put under the axe and his lab plundered.

name: Crystallized urine from a magi
description: Crystallized urine from a magical beast has been found in the melting snow.

name: Crystallized urine from a magi
description: Crystallized urine from a magical beast has been found in the melting snow.

name: One of your lords is fond of h
description: One of your lords is fond of hunting. While on such an endeavor he stumbled upon the lair of a hideous troll. After having swiftly slain the creature, the brave nobleman ventured further into its lair. There he found, among rotting refuse, a small purse with a few smallish coins. He donated these to the benefit of the nation, but kept all the nice magic stuff for himself.

name: A stranger was washed ashore f
description: A stranger was washed ashore from the sea. He remembers nothing of his past, but seems to retain his formidable skills and has joined your cause.

name: Carnivorous apes are causing u
description: Carnivorous apes are causing unrest in the region.

name: A little known sect of carnivo
description: A little known sect of carnivorous apes are sacrificing humans in the woods.

name: Humans have disappeared at nig
description: Humans have disappeared at night, never to return.

name: A malevolent conjurer, jealous
description: A malevolent conjurer, jealous of your power, sent a demon to slay one of your commanders.

name: A mob of monkeys has beaten th
description: A mob of monkeys has beaten the local human sheriff to death.

name: Humans have been killed or dri
description: Humans have been killed or driven from the province in large numbers.

name: A demon summoned by local bloo
description: A demon summoned by local blood-cultists has run amok.

name: A foreign tribe of apes have a
description: A foreign tribe of apes have attacked the province. They seem to be capturing commoners and transporting them into the jungle for unknown -probably hideous- ends.

name: Volunteers have collected virg
description: Volunteers have collected virgin humans for sacrifice.

name: Followers of the local blood c
description: Followers of the local blood cult have summoned forest demons into your service.

name: People of the province are rev
description: People of the province are revolting against the local practice of blood magic and have liberated some blood slaves.

name: A gang of vengeful rakshas has
description: A gang of vengeful rakshas has sought out one of your faithful devatas. Trying to slay him, the have attacked the province in force.

name: A wise old mage was rumored to
description: A wise old mage was rumored to have discovered the secret of transmuting lead into gold. Alas, despite attempts of persuasion, he arrogantly refused to share his discoveries and was at last decapitated. His executors were surprised to find his loosened head still muttering. It has now been preserved and transported to the laboratory. [Skull Mentor]

name: An ancient guru has transcende
description: An ancient guru has transcended. His skull continues to provide wisdom and guidance and has been added to your collection of magic wonders. [Skull Mentor]

name: A mob of monkeys has beaten th
description: A mob of monkeys has beaten the local human sheriff to death.

name: A little known sect of dark ap
description: A little known sect of dark apes are sacrificing humans in the woods. It may be just a rumor.

name: An ancient guru has transcende
description: An ancient guru has transcended. His skull continues to provide wisdom and guidance and has been added to your collection of magic wonders. [Skull Mentor]

name: The carcass of a dead shambler
description: The carcass of a dead shambler washed ashore during one of the worst storms in memory. The creatures skin was fashioned into a piece of armor. [Shambler Skin Armor]

name: An industrious clan has migrat
description: An industrious clan has migrated into the area. They mine for gold but are also making people angry with their bad ale-drinking habits and boisterous demeanor.

name: Magic is suffusing this realm.
description: Magic is suffusing this realm. The very air is crystallizing into gems of magic.

name: Magic is suffusing this realm.
description: Magic is suffusing this realm. The very sea is crystallizing into gems of magic.

name: A malevolent conjurer, jealous
description: A malevolent conjurer, jealous of your power, has sent a demon to slay one of your commanders.

description: A law has been decreed against sodomy.

description: Epidemic dysentery is spreading.

name: A tribe of subterranean goblin
description: A tribe of subterranean goblins have emerged. They are wealthy and spendthrift with their silver, but cause trouble wherever they go.

name: People have been investing in
description: People have been investing in a pyramid game, that has now deflated.

description: One of your researchers stumbled upon an ancient skin-bound tome and read a passage aloud. Unfortunately all those who happened to listen have been cursed for the rest of their miserable lives.

description: Miasmatic fumes have risen from the swamp, bringing pestilence to those living or traveling in the surrounding area.

name: A failed experiment caused a f
description: A failed experiment caused a fire in the lab. It was dowsed with the most quickly available fluid, a barrel of goats blood. Unfortunately, the malignant fumes thus created spread quite far from the building. Those exposed have suffered diverse unnatural effects.

description: A huge copper bull was excavated from an ancient buried settlement. The proud locals put it in the shrine, somewhat covering your effigy. A visiting leper was cured and now a cult has formed around the foreign idol.

description: A ragged traveler appeared on the borders of the waste. He claimed to have found the ruins of the fabled city of K'leng. Before he was driven back into the waste by villagers offended by his preposterous statement, he offered as proof an item he supposedly found on the gilded altar of a temple in the ruined city.

name: There is an old legend in this
description: There is an old legend in this land: Once upon a time a mighty wizard built his abode upon the highest peak. From there he worked his magic, trying to control the winds and the clouds and the beasts that fly. Angered by the wizards hubris, the Lord of Thunder struck him with such force that the mountain was cloven in half. The legend tells that some of the magic of that place remains and whomever finds the wizards skull shall command all winged beings on earth. [The Cloven Mountain]

description: The trolls want their land back!

description: A large band of renegade War Lobsters are raiding the province.

name: The wolves are hungry this win
description: The wolves are hungry this winter and locals are being attacked and killed by the score. Some of the beasts are monstrously large.

name: Many have been afflicted by a
description: Many have been afflicted by a convulsive disease, known as Evil Fire.

description: A band of renegade Shrimp Soldiers have been recruited into your service.

description: An evil Lord and his hirelings are trying to take over the land!

name: The local lawman has been foun
description: The local lawman has been found frolicking with water spirits in the kelp forest instead of carrying out his duties.

name: A Giant is harassing the small
description: A Giant is harassing the smallholders in the foothills. The local commander has decided to rid the land of its evil.

name: A basilisk has attacked one of
description: A basilisk has attacked one of your commanders. Its lair is probably nearby. [Basilisk Cave]

name: A basilisk has been encountere
description: A basilisk has been encountered! Its lair is probably nearby. [Basilisk Cave]

name: Basilisks have escaped from th
description: Basilisks have escaped from the cave!. [Basilisk Cave]

description: A basilisk has escaped from the Tower of the Deformer! [Tower of the Deformer]

name: It is rumored that a great Pyr
description: It is rumored that a great Pyromancer once worked her magic in these lands. Some say her tower remains. [Scorched Tower]

name: There are rumors of a forgotte
description: There are rumors of a forgotten oasis deep in the waste. [Forgotten Oasis]

name: There are rumors of a forgotte
description: There are rumors of a forgotten oasis deep in the waste. [Plaguewater Oasis]

name: They say a twisted necromancer
description: They say a twisted necromancer once lived in these lands. The stories claim he collected human bones to decorate his garden. [Garden of Bones]

name: The Circle Master and his adep
description: The Circle Master and his adepts have fashioned a Magical Circle to aid in the performing of rituals. [Conjurer's Circle]

name: There are rumors of a forgotte
description: There are rumors of a forgotten oasis deep in the waste.

name: There are rumors of a hidden c
description: There are rumors of a hidden cave, wherein mages of great power sleep since ages past. [Cave of the Sleepers]

name: An experiment in the arcane la
description: An experiment in the arcane laboratory has gone awry! Strange energies were released, affecting one of your mages.

name: A Sibyl has foretold the immin
description: A Sibyl has foretold the imminent ascension of ##fullgodname##. People flock to the temple and some have volunteered to your armies

name: One of the Harpies could not r
description: One of the Harpies could not resist the gleaming pearls in the treasury.

name: A convict attempts revenge!
description: A convict attempts revenge!

name: Some soldiers strayed into The
description: Some soldiers strayed into The Forest of Avalon. They were swiftly turned away by the wardens. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: The Old Ways are lost. Magic f
description: The Old Ways are lost. Magic fades. Some of the gems have lost their power. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: The Old Ways are lost. Magic f
description: The Old Ways are lost. Magic fades. Some of the gems have lost their power. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: The Old Ways are lost. Magic f
description: The Old Ways are lost. Magic fades. Some of the gems have lost their power. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: The natives are complaining.
description: The natives are complaining.

name: The natives are unruly. There
description: The natives are unruly. There has been some resistance against your officials and taxes have not been paid in full. Unless dealt with promptly, things may escalate. Your warlords claim that force is the only option, while your priests argue that perhaps a new temple may bring unity.

name: People flock to your glorious
description: People flock to your glorious new temple! The natives have come into the fold and sing hymns at the feet of your image. Rich offerings have been given at the altar.

name: The unruly elements have been
description: The unruly elements have been forcefully dealt with. You rule is now unopposed.

name: The emerging rebellion has not
description: The emerging rebellion has not been dealt with in time. A leader has emerged among the natives. He or she is hiding among the people, organizing resistance against your rule.

name: The local rebellion has reache
description: The local rebellion has reached its climax. Riots are erupting everywhere! The few loyal men in the defence have been slaughtered by angry kinsmen and an all-out attack has been coordinated by the leaders of the resistance!

name: The tax collector has been way
description: The tax collector has been waylaid! Some say the rebellious locals are behind this.

name: Your forces are trying to cont
description: Your forces are trying to control the rebellious province, but they cannot fight what they cannot find. More men will not help, but perhaps a prolonged search.

name: Some of your settlers have bee
description: Some of your settlers have been killed in quarrels with the natives.

name: Your agents have gained inform
description: Your agents have gained information on the whereabouts of the native resistance leaders. A thorough search by armed men may finally bring these criminals to justice.

name: More men are needed to control
description: More men are needed to control the rebellious natives!

name: Men have defected from the loc
description: Men have defected from the local defence. They are more loyal to their kinsmen. Some have even joined the growing resistance movement!

name: Opposition against your rule i
description: Opposition against your rule is increasing!

name: A native warrior has challenge
description: A native warrior has challenged one of your commanders to a duel.

name: There has been an attempt to m
description: There has been an attempt to murder one of your officials.

name: Your men found the hideout of
description: Your men found the hideout of the resistance leaders, and a battle ensued!

name: The natives have reclaimed the
description: The natives have reclaimed their land!

name: Your men have gained informati
description: Your men have gained information on the whereabouts of the native resistance leaders. They will soon be brought to justice!

name: It is rumored that the Old Way
description: It is rumored that the Old Ways have not left this land. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: Traces of the Old Magic has em
description: Traces of the Old Magic has emerged in a remote village. A young girl has the Witches Mark upon her! Perhaps it would be wise to send a Magister of Theology, lest her power grows, or perhaps one of the Arcane to find out more.

name: The Magister has found the Mar
description: The Magister has found the Marked girl infested with the Old Magics. Regrettably, the poor soul had to be cleansed by fire. Under her bed was found a Mistletoe Garland. [Mistletoe Garland]

name: The Magister Arcane has invest
description: The Magister Arcane has investigated the poor girl and indeed found her Marked as of old, when some children were chosen at birth by the Old Magics. There also seems to be more strange things afoot in the area. A huntsman claims he once heard voices in the woods at nightfall. If given time and some guards while exploring the forest, the Magister may find out more.

name: While exploring the forest, yo
description: While exploring the forest, your servant was attacked by a large wolf!

name: While exploring the forest, yo
description: While exploring the forest, your servant was attacked by a strange being made of roots and twigs!

name: While exploring the forest, yo
description: While exploring the forest, your Magister found an enchanted glen! [Glen of Verdant Greenery]

name: One of the villagers approache
description: One of the villagers approached the Magister with some acorns. They turned out to be infused with the Old Magics. [Handful of Acorns]

name: The Magister has stumbled upon
description: The Magister has stumbled upon a circle of oaks in the woods. The place seemed of ancient origin but recently used. Utilizing a hex of concealment he observed the place during the night of the new moon and witnessed a ritual performed by the villagers. At the finale the young witch cried out in the forgotten tongue and proved herself a child of the Old Ways! She has been accepted into your service, but the Magister fears her power may have sinister consequences.

name: The Old Ways have been practic
description: The Old Ways have been practiced in the land. Farmers look forward to rich harvests and children are born healthy. But as the power of the witches stir, so does the Curse... [Cursed Land]

name: The magic of the witch has rel
description: The magic of the witch has released The Curse upon this land! [Cursed Land]

name: The Old Ways have been practic
description: The Old Ways have been practiced in the land. Farmers look forward to rich harvests and children are born healthy. But as the power of the witches stir, so does the Curse...

name: The magic of the land has curs
description: The magic of the land has cursed some of your men.

name: It is rumored that the Old Way
description: It is rumored that the Old Ways have not left this land. [The Forest of Avalon]

name: The Curse is spreading! [Curse
description: The Curse is spreading! [Cursed Land]

name: A fiery disease sweeps the lan
description: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A clever warlock has transmuted the burning fevers into fire gems.

name: A fiery disease sweeps the lan
description: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A clever warlock has transmuted the burning fevers into a wealth of fire gems.

name: A fiery disease sweeps the lan
description: A fiery disease sweeps the land. A clever warlock has transmuted the burning fevers into fire gems.

name: Local forest spirits have gath
description: Local forest spirits have gathered strength to fight the burning god.

name: Local forest spirits have gath
description: Local forest spirits have gathered strength to fight the burning god.

description: Local forest spirits have gathered strength to fight the burning god.

description: The forest fights back against the burning god!

description: The forest fights back against the burning god!

name: The forest fights back against
description: The forest fights back against the burning god!

name: The forest fights back against
description: The forest fights back against your aura of decay!

name: The Silver Sarcophagus has ope
description: The Silver Sarcophagus has opened. Terror rises from within! [Silver Sarcophagus]

name: The Silver Sarcophagus has bee
description: The Silver Sarcophagus has been found and opened! From its maw unwholesome energies have emanated, affecting all with death and decay.

name: A temple of the ancestors has
description: A temple of the ancestors has been found and restored to splendor! [Jungle Temple]

name: A temple of the ancestors has
description: A temple of the ancestors has been found and restored to splendor! [Jungle Temple]

name: A temple of the ancestors has
description: A temple of the ancestors has been found and restored to splendor! [Jungle Temple]

name: In the absence of a taskmaster
description: In the absence of a taskmaster, one of the carnivores has run amok. It was killed, but not before causing some mayhem.

name: The ruins of an ancient temple
description: The ruins of an ancient temple has been found. Its crypt is sealed with magic. The mages of the Old Empire probably have knowledge of such things. [Ancient Temple]

name: The Spectator has investigated
description: The Spectator has investigated the runes inscribed on the gate to the temples crypt. A strong and ancient ward seals something within. Given time he may be able to unravel the bindings, but perhaps it would be safer to send one of the Elders.

name: Your Arch Bishop has consecrat
description: Your Arch Bishop has consecrated the altar of the Ancient Temple. The dead and the not yet dead whisper your praise! [Ancient Temple]

name: The Spectator recognizes some
description: The Spectator recognizes some of the markings in the crypt -signs of warning and runes of containment. He has managed to unravel some of them.

name: At last! The ancient magic of
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! From the darkness within comes a being of terror and power to serve the God of Death. Woe to the living!

name: During his attempt to break th
description: During his attempt to break the wards of the temple crypt, your servant released some of their magic and was utterly destroyed.

name: During his attempt to break th
description: During his attempt to break the wards of the temple crypt, your servant released some of their magic and was utterly destroyed.

name: Studying the ancient magic tha
description: Studying the ancient magic that seals the temple crypt, your servant has gained insights in the workings of the arts!

name: The Dusk Elder recognizes the
description: The Dusk Elder recognizes the ancient runes sealing the temple crypt. Some are easily broken, but others need time and the process is dangerous.

name: During his attempt to break th
description: During his attempt to break the wards of the temple crypt, your servant released some of their magic and was utterly destroyed.

name: Studying the ancient magic tha
description: Studying the ancient magic that seals the temple crypt, your servant has gained deeper knowledge of the arts!

name: At last! The ancient magic of
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! From the darkness within comes a being of terror and power to serve the God of Death. Woe to the living!

name: At last! The ancient magic of
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! Within its vault the dried husk of a mage-priest of old was found. [Skull Mentor]

name: At last! The ancient magic of
description: At last! The ancient magic of the temple crypt has been unraveled! Within its vault an item of power was found. [Skull Staff]

name: The Dusk Elder recognizes the
description: The Dusk Elder recognizes the ancient runes sealing the temple crypt. Some are easily broken, but others need time and the process is dangerous.

name: Having prevented a village of
description: Having prevented a village of fishermen from eating an exceptionally large and tasty fish the Bodhisattva released it into the ocean. The fish then transformed back into its true dragon shape and returned to his father, the Dragon King. The grateful father sent as a gift of thanks his most precious possession, the pearl of light. The gift was accepted only on the condition that the messenger, who was also the Dragon King's grand daughter, would take the pearl. The dragon girl accepted, and the two has been inseparable ever since. Longnu still carries her grand fathers pearl of light.

name: Raiders from sea are harrying
description: Raiders from sea are harrying coastal settlements. The governor of the province asks for gold to strengthen defenses.

name: Raiders from the sea have been
description: Raiders from the sea have been repelled! Seeing that the Good Lord provides safety, people are now more eager to pay their taxes.

name: Some of the gold for the defen
description: Some of the gold for the defenses seem to have gone into the pockets of the local governor.

name: Raiders from the sea have been
description: Raiders from the sea have been repelled, but not before they slaughtered the men, women, children and cattle of some coastal villages. People are upset. The local governor again asks for gold to strengthen defenses!

name: Raiders from the sea are conti
description: Raiders from the sea are continuing to harry the coastal settlements.

name: Your temple has been burnt by
description: Your temple has been burnt by raiders from the sea!

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the poorly defended land.

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the raiders! Your people cry your name in anguish while pirates from the sea bear down upon the poorly defended land.

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the raiders! Your people cry your name in anguish while pirates from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: Raiders from the sea have been
description: Raiders from the sea have been repelled! Seeing that the Good Lord provides safety, people are now more eager to pay their taxes.

name: Chaotic energies leak from the
description: Chaotic energies leak from the demon gate. A very powerful blood-mage may be able to control them. [The Demon Gate]

name: Someone has been meddling with
description: Someone has been meddling with the Demon Gate! Its chaotic energies have suffused the aether of this world, spreading chaos and corruption. [The Demon Gate]

name: The master of Blood Magic has
description: The master of Blood Magic has studied the magic of the Demon Gate. Soon, it will be under your control.

name: The master of Blood Magic has
description: The master of Blood Magic has been able to control the energies of the Demon Gate. Powerful Devils have been summoned and bound into service!

name: The Blood Mage has lost contro
description: The Blood Mage has lost control of the chaotic energies of The Demon Gate! A multitude of Devils have emerged to wreak havoc.

name: A benevolent star rises. Durin
description: A benevolent star rises. During its reign the wounded and diseased will find succor.

name: The sun grows dim! A solar ecl
description: The sun grows dim! A solar eclipse of mystical origin has shrouded the world in darkness.

name: The Sign of Nodens has been fo
description: The Sign of Nodens has been found. Wounds have miraculously healed all over the world. [Sign of Nodens]

name: The Vale of Infinite Horror ha
description: The Vale of Infinite Horror has been found! Many have been marked... [The Vale of Infinite Horror]

name: Mages of The Ebony Circle have
description: Mages of The Ebony Circle have attempted a ritual of great power. The malignant energies released have spread across the world. [The Ebony Circle]

name: Mabakiel The Bringer of Misery
description: Mabakiel The Bringer of Misery has been summoned into the world! In his wake, disease is spreading.

name: The Eater of Dreams has emerge
description: The Eater of Dreams has emerged, lurking behind the veil of sleep. People all across the world suffer from nightmares, marking their spirits as food for the Eater.

name: An abomination rises from the
description: An abomination rises from the sea!

name: The Goat Sun has been summoned
description: The Goat Sun has been summoned into the world!

name: The Throne of Life brings yout
description: The Throne of Life brings youth to all living. [The Throne of Life]

name: The Throne of Death has awoken
description: The Throne of Death has awoken! Life suddenly seems shorter. [The Throne of Death]

name: The power of The Throne of For
description: The power of The Throne of Fortune is spreading. [The Throne of Fortune]

name: The power of The Throne of Mis
description: The power of The Throne of Misfortune is spreading. [The Throne of Misfortune]

name: The Throne of Pestilence sprea
description: The Throne of Pestilence spreads its disease throughout the world. [The Throne of Pestilence]

name: An extra throne of pestilence
description: An extra throne of pestilence reset. There are other resetting events also.HIDDEN.

name: The Throne of Summer is spread
description: The Throne of Summer is spreading warmth across the world. [The Throne of Summer]

name: The Throne of Winter is spread
description: The Throne of Winter is spreading cold across the world. [The Throne of Winter]

name: Wolves have come to serve the
description: Wolves have come to serve the Lord of The Winter Throne. [The Throne of Winter]

name: An Ice Druid has come to serve
description: An Ice Druid has come to serve the Lord of The Winter Throne. [The Throne of Winter]

name: The Ice Druid has utilized the
description: The Ice Druid has utilized the power of The Winter Throne to summon some magical beings. [The Throne of Winter]

name: The lands around the Throne of
description: The lands around the Throne of Winter are growing increasingly cold. [The Throne of Winter]

name: The land has been trapped in p
description: The land has been trapped in perpetual winter. [Frozen Lands]

name: A tribe of Yetis has come to s
description: A tribe of Yetis has come to serve the Lord of The Winter Throne. [The Throne of Winter]

name: If given time, an astral mage
description: If given time, an astral mage may be able to find interesting things at the Eye Pebble Plain. [Eye Pebble Plain]

name: Your mage has found a curious
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. [Eye of the Void]

name: Your mage has found a curious
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. [Eye of Aiming]

name: Your mage has found a curious
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. [Eyecatcher]

name: Your mage has found a curious
description: Your mage has found a curious item among the pebbles. There seems to be no more of interest here. [Eye of Innocence]

name: Your mage has found some magic
description: Your mage has found some magical pearls among the pebbles of the beach.

name: The Enchanted Current has prod
description: The Enchanted Current has produced some extra magical pearls this month! [Enchanted Current]

name: Bernlad and his steed have fou
description: Bernlad and his steed have found The Vale of Unicorns! [The Vale of Unicorns]

name: Bernlad has bested a fellow Kn
description: Bernlad has bested a fellow Knight. When yielding, the man swore to serve your cause.

name: Preparations for the celebrati
description: Preparations for the celebration of the yearly ritual of the sacred marriage are underway. Come spring the Entu and his Ensi are supposed to be joined in the sacred marriage that will provide fertility for the coming year.

name: The Entu and Ensi have consumm
description: The Entu and Ensi have consummated the Sacred Marriage in the yearly ritual of fertility. There was much rejoicing.

name: The Entu is missing from the c
description: The Entu is missing from the capital and the Sacred Marriage cannot be performed! This is seen as a very bad omen.

name: The Ensi is missing from the c
description: The Ensi is missing from the capital and the Sacred Marriage cannot be performed! This is seen as a very bad omen.

name: The Entu and Ensi are missing
description: The Entu and Ensi are missing from the capital and the Sacred Marriage cannot be performed! This is seen as a very bad omen.

name: The Sacred Marriage has borne
description: The Sacred Marriage has borne fruit! The fields and orchards of Ur provide the first plentiful harvest of the year!

name: The fecund power of The Sacred
description: The fecund power of The Sacred Marriage prevails! The fields and orchards of Ur provide a second plentiful harvest of the year!

name: The fields and orchards of Ur
description: The fields and orchards of Ur are barren this year. Famine threatens the people.

name: In the wake of famine comes pl
description: In the wake of famine comes plague!

name: The lamentations of the Galas
description: The lamentations of the Galas has drawn the attention of spirits from the underworld.

name: Your Sal-Me has blessed the la
description: Your Sal-Me has blessed the land with fertility! [The First City]

name: A tribe of rural Enkidu has co
description: A tribe of rural Enkidu has come to attend the upcoming festival. Some have been recruited as warriors of the realm.

name: People have come bearing gifts
description: People have come bearing gifts for the upcoming festival of fertility.

name: Swamp dwellers have come to at
description: Swamp dwellers have come to attend the upcoming festival. Some have been recruited as warriors.

name: Enkidu slaves have rebelled!
description: Enkidu slaves have rebelled!

name: A runaway slave from the land
description: A runaway slave from the land of the avvites has appeared. He brings to your altar an item taken from the body of his former master. [Ring of the Warrior]

name: One of your Hunter Chiefs has
description: One of your Hunter Chiefs has ventured into the swamp. There he single-handedly fought and bested a giant crocodile. Thus tamed it has now been put to use in war.

name: One of the Elders has stepped
description: One of the Elders has stepped forth to quell the growing unrest in the capital.

name: A new king has been crowned. H
description: A new king has been crowned. He is now become divine and sits upon the throne of Both Worlds. The king has yet to marry his favorite sister so that the land shall have a queen and the king a spouse with which to share his power. Despite this there was much celebration and commerce.

name: A new queen has been crowned.
description: A new queen has been crowned. She is now become divine and sits upon the throne of Land and Water. The queen has yet to marry her favorite brother, so that the land shall have a king and the queen a spouse with which to share her power. Despite this there was much celebration and commerce.

name: The King has married his favor
description: The King has married his favorite sister and she was crowned Queen of Land and Water. She is now become divine and sits upon the throne of Land and Water. Together they will rule the land of the Setting Sun. A month of festivities followed the royal marriage and there was much commerce and happiness.

name: The Queen has married her favo
description: The Queen has married her favorite brother and he was crowned King of Both Worlds. He is now become divine and sits upon the throne of Both Worlds. Together they will rule the land of the Setting Sun. A month of festivities followed the royal marriage and there was much commerce and happiness.

name: There is no queen. The king is
description: There is no queen. The king is expected to marry his favorite sister, but she is far away, and the people are worried that the land will be left without a queen for months to come.

name: There is no king. The queen is
description: There is no king. The queen is expected to marry her favorite brother, but he is far away, and the people are worried that the land will be left without a king for months to come.

name: An assassin tried to eliminate
description: An assassin tried to eliminate one of the princes of the kingdom. His brother is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to eliminate
description: An assassin tried to eliminate one of the princesses of the kingdom. Her sister is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to eliminate
description: An assassin tried to eliminate the King. His brother is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to eliminate
description: An assassin tried to eliminate the Queen. Her sister is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to poison on
description: An assassin tried to poison one of the princes of the kingdom. His brother is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to poison on
description: An assassin tried to poison one of the princesses of the kingdom. Her sister is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to poison th
description: An assassin tried to poison the King. His brother is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: An assassin tried to poison th
description: An assassin tried to poison the Queen. Her sister is suspected, but nothing could be proved.

name: One of the princes was caught
description: One of the princes was caught conspiring against the King who, to his great dismay, had to execute his treasonous brother.

name: One of the princesses was caug
description: One of the princesses was caught conspiring against the Queen. The treasonous sister was forced to suicide by the bite of an asp.

name: The innermost crypt in The Tom
description: The innermost crypt in The Tomb of the Ancients is sealed. A master of death magic may be able to open it. [Tomb of the Ancients]

name: Someone has meddled with the s
description: Someone has meddled with the sealed doors in The Tomb of the Ancients. A curse has taken effect.

name: The necromantic master has fou
description: The necromantic master has found a way to open The Tomb of the Ancients. The wards are ancient, dangerous and powerful, but given time they may be broken.

name: A horror has been attracted by
description: A horror has been attracted by the meddling with the doors in The Tomb of the Ancients.

name: The sealed doors in The Tomb o
description: The sealed doors in The Tomb of the Ancients have been opened! The malevolent force slumbering inside has been released!

name: The sealed doors in The Tomb o
description: The sealed doors in The Tomb of the Ancients have been opened! The malevolent force slumbering inside has woken to serve your will.

name: A horror has been attracted by
description: A horror has been attracted by the meddling in The Tomb of the Ancients.

name: Ever since The Crown of Darkne
description: Ever since The Crown of Darkness was found, a lingering shadow has been growing in the sky above its location. It has now spread to blot out the sun! [Crown of Darkness]

name: Dark tendrils of pure shadow s
description: Dark tendrils of pure shadow slowly seeps from The Crown of Darkness into the sky. [Crown of Darkness]

name: The power of The Throne of Nig
description: The power of The Throne of Night has been invoked! Ever since, the day has grown dimmer. Now Night has overtaken Day and all is darkness!

name: The power of The Throne of Nig
description: The power of The Throne of Night has been invoked! The days will grow dimmer until, in eight months time, the night overtakes the day! [The Throne of Night]

name: A local gravedigger has heard
description: A local gravedigger has heard scratching and howling from beneath the stone slab covering an old grave. He refuses to open it unless a Black Priest is present. [Black Forest]

name: The grave has been opened unde
description: The grave has been opened under the supervision of a Black Priest. Underneath the heavy stone slab a vampire was trapped! It has now joined your cause.

name: A gang of ghouls have been rou
description: A gang of ghouls have been rounded up and forced into service. [Cave of Ghouls]

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: The visiting friar has preache
description: The visiting friar has preached to the lost souls in this province and turned their hearts to the true faith!

name: The visiting friar has held a
description: The visiting friar has held a sermon. His words inspired such passion that the faithful of the land gathered to raise a temple to your glory!

name: The visiting friar has perform
description: The visiting friar has performed a miracle! A lame boy was healed and his wealthy mother has donated all her riches to the church.

name: The visiting friar has held a
description: The visiting friar has held a sermon. His words inspired such passion that some of the faithful has taken to arms to fight for the righteous God, ##godname##!

name: An old scroll was found in the
description: An old scroll was found in the temple ruins. It contains treaties on the necromantic arts. Your Marshmaster has been able to grasp its secrets. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: An old scroll was found in the
description: An old scroll was found in the temple ruins. It contains treaties on the necromantic arts. Your Grand Thaumaturg has been able to grasp its secrets. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: Something stirs in the land of
description: Something stirs in the land of the dead! A weary traveler crosses the once verdant lands. He seeks the fabled Ruins of the Old Empire. [Ruins of the Old Empire]

name: In one of the desolated villag
description: In one of the desolated villages, a buried treasure has been found!

name: In an abandoned tower, some ma
description: In an abandoned tower, some magical gems have been found.

name: The dead workers of the mine h
description: The dead workers of the mine has been reanimated. They now toil unceasingly day and night. This has increased the yield of gold. [Gold Mine]

name: Your undead servants have been
description: Your undead servants have been put to work in the mine. They toil unceasingly day and night. This has increased the yield of silver. [Silver Mine]

name: Your undead servants have been
description: Your undead servants have been put to work in the mine. They toil unceasingly day and night. This has increased the yield of gold. [Hidden Gold Mine]

name: A plague has eradicated the re
description: A plague has eradicated the remaining population!

name: Faced with the inevitable, som
description: Faced with the inevitable, some of the living have turned to the necromantic arts for protection. They are now trying to take control of the province!

name: Your Dusk Elder has found the
description: Your Dusk Elder has found the lab of a famous wizard who died a some time ago. The man has now been conjured as a spectre, to serve once more.

name: Food has long been scarce. The
description: Food has long been scarce. The last harvest yielded next to nothing. People are dying by the score.

name: The forest is dying. Some last
description: The forest is dying. Some last power of life has awoken, trying to fight the impeding doom.

description: Food has long been scarce. The last harvest yielded next to nothing. People are emigrating in hope of finding arable land.

description: An Imperial Tomb from before the fall of Ermor has been found! It is sealed with magic. The Marshmasters may retain knowledge of how to be break such wards. [Imperial Tomb]

name: Your Marshmaster has studied t
description: Your Marshmaster has studied the runes of warding on the Tomb. They can be broken, but the process is dangerous and may take time.

name: While dabbling with the wards
description: While dabbling with the wards of the old Ermorian Tomb, your mage released some of their magics and was utterly destroyed!

name: Your mage has studied the minu
description: Your mage has studied the minuscule inscriptions on the door of the Imperial Tomb, gaining deeper knowledge of the dark arts.

name: While dabbling with the wards
description: While dabbling with the wards of the old Ermorian Tomb, your mage released its guardians!

name: At last, your mage has been ab
