name: At last, your mage has been ab
description: At last, your mage has been able to dispel the wards of the Tomb. It has been purged by holy rites of cleansing. The items of power within were sent to the House of Fiery Justice for safekeeping. [Amulet of the Dead]

name: At last, your mage has been ab
description: At last, your mage has been able to dispel the wards of the Tomb. It has been purged by holy rites of cleansing. The items of power within were sent to the House of Fiery Justice for safekeeping. [Amulet of the Dead]

name: A heretical movement seems to
description: A heretical movement seems to have taken root in the province! Among other things, they abstain from animal food and disregard the clergy! Perhaps someone from the House of Fiery Justice should be sent. Or if a more subtle approach is suitable mayhap one of the friars or inquisitors can put things to rest.

name: The heretics are strengthening
description: The heretics are strengthening their influence! Something must be done.

name: The heretics are strengthening
description: The heretics are strengthening their influence! Tension are rising. There have been some attacks on the heretics by faithful commoners.

name: Your friar has held a sermon e
description: Your friar has held a sermon expanding upon the sacrament of the priesthood. He seems to have had some success in swaying the general populace from the heresies.

name: Heretical teachings have once
description: Heretical teachings have once again surfaced in the area. Perhaps someone from the House of Just Fires should be sent. Or if a more subtle approach is suitable mayhap one of the friars can put things to rest.

name: Your Inquisitor has interrogat
description: Your Inquisitor has interrogated a few of the heretics and found them lacking in purity of faith. If given twenty men he will arrest the most prominent leaders and put an end to their false preachings!

name: Leaders of the heretical movem
description: Leaders of the heretical movement and their families have been arrested, incarcerated and forced to confess. Many have been put on the pyre. Purity of faith is now ensured! Also, some of their belongings have been confiscated.

name: During the arrest of the leade
description: During the arrest of the leaders of the heretical movement, some supposedly innocent bystanders were killed. This incited the mob and now there is a full-blown riot going on!

name: Your High Inquisitor has inter
description: Your High Inquisitor has interrogated a few of the heretics and found them lacking in purity of faith. If given twenty men he will arrest the most prominent leaders and put an end to their false preachings!

name: Leaders of the heretical movem
description: Leaders of the heretical movement and their families have been arrested, incarcerated and forced to confess. Many have been put on the pyre. Purity of faith is now ensured! Some of their belongings have also been confiscated.

name: During the arrest of the leade
description: During the arrest of the leaders of the heretical movement, some supposedly innocent bystanders were killed. This incited the mob and now there is a full-blown riot going on!

name: Your Witch Hunter has tracked
description: Your Witch Hunter has tracked some leaders of the heretical movement. They have been interrogated thoroughly and revealed much. It seems they have made pacts with devils to snare the hearts of the innocent commoners! The most prominent warlocks have been put to the pyre and all is now well. In their abode some items of power were found. [Imp Familiar]

name: Your Witch Hunter has tracked
description: Your Witch Hunter has tracked some leaders of the heretical movement. During their interrogation, things got out of hand and one or two of them did not survive the rigors. Unfortunately they seem to have been loved by the commoners and a riot has broken out!

name: Your Grand Master has tracked
description: Your Grand Master has tracked some leaders of the heretical movement. They have been interrogated thoroughly and revealed much. It seems they have made pacts with devils to snare the hearts of the innocent commoners! The most prominent warlocks have been put to the pyre and all is now well. In their abode some items of power were found. [Imp Familiar]

name: Your Grand Master has tracked
description: Your Grand Master has tracked some leaders of the heretical movement. During their interrogation, things got out of hand and one or two of them did not survive the rigors. Unfortunately they seem to have been loved by the commoners and a riot has broken out!

name: The riots have escalated. It s
description: The riots have escalated. It seems the heretics had support among the local nobility who are now trying to take control of the province!

name: Your friar has held a sermon o
description: Your friar has held a sermon on the virtue of acceptance, reducing the growing unrest in the region.

name: Your friar has performed a mir
description: Your friar has performed a miracle! A lame man was made hale, a mute sang hymns in your praise!

name: There have been rumors of witc
description: There have been rumors of witchcraft! Someone from The House of Just Fires should be sent to root it out!

name: The abode of a witch has been
description: The abode of a witch has been found. The crone herself must have turned into a crow and escaped, but some of her belongings have been confiscated and transported to the lab.

name: A full coven seems to be at wo
description: A full coven seems to be at work! Your Witch Hunter urges that at least twenty armed men are sent to help hunt them down.

name: A witch has attacked your serv
description: A witch has attacked your servant!

name: The Witch Hunter has performed
description: The Witch Hunter has performed a Trial By Water. Unfortunately the poor girl did not float. Her sacrifice was not in vain, as the hunt continues. ##godname## bless her soul!

name: The Witch Hunter has performed
description: The Witch Hunter has performed a Trial By Water. The girl floated as a fat goose on the water and was promptly lapidated until she sank.

name: People are getting increasingl
description: People are getting increasingly aware of the presence witches in their midst. Several have been revealed by good and pious neighbors bearing witness of their evil magic.

name: When put to the pyre, one of t
description: When put to the pyre, one of the witches uttered a dark curse over the realm!

name: The coven has been found! Your
description: The coven has been found! Your men are fighting them with magic and steel.

name: A Witch Hunter should lead the
description: A Witch Hunter should lead the men if the coven is to be found.

name: For the time being, there seem
description: For the time being, there seems to be no traces of witchery left in the area.

name: It has been revealed that one
description: It has been revealed that one of the noble women of the land has been practicing witchcraft! She has been muted and put in the dungeon. Her sorcerous tools were confiscated and her family willingly paid a handsome fine.

name: Witchery! Your servant has bee
description: Witchery! Your servant has been attacked by a poisonous spider!

name: Witchery! Milk has turned sour
description: Witchery! Milk has turned sour in the udder! A crow was seen molesting an eagle! Surely this is proof of Dark Arts afoot in the realm!

name: Your Initiate has been befuddl
description: Your Initiate has been befuddled by the craft of the witches. He claims the rumors are false and the accused women innocent! Someone more experienced should be sent.

name: The abode of a witch has been
description: The abode of a witch has been found. The crone herself must have turned into a crow and escaped, but some of her belongings have been confiscated and transported to the lab. [Thistle Mace)

description: The witches and their servants are trying to take over the province!

name: Some promising Hatchlings have
description: Some promising Hatchlings have been sighted in the swamp. The swamp can be a dangerous place, but perhaps a Hydra Tamer could perhaps be sent to catch them.

description: Your Hydra Tamer has stumbled upon some ancient ruins deep in the swamp! [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: Your Hydra Tamer has caught so
description: Your Hydra Tamer has caught some Hatchlings.

name: Your Hydra Tamer has stirred a
description: Your Hydra Tamer has stirred an aggressive Hatchling!

name: Your Hydra Tamer has located t
description: Your Hydra Tamer has located the nesting place of a full-grown specimen. A handful of men are needed to aid him in the hunt if the Hydra is to be caught.

name: The Hydra was found but could
description: The Hydra was found but could not be controlled! Angered by attempts to catch it, the beast now runs amok!

name: The Hydra has been caught and
description: The Hydra has been caught and tamed!

name: During the attempts to catch t
description: During the attempts to catch the Hydra, it was unfortunately killed. In its lair some corpses and treasures were found.

description: A crocodile has attacked!

description: A swamp monster has attacked!

name: A swamp monster has attacked!
description: A swamp monster has attacked!

name: Your Hydra tamer has encounter
description: Your Hydra tamer has encountered a strange tribe in the swamp. They seem gullible and can probably be bought with wine, trinkets and pearls of glass. [Toad Tribe Settlement]

name: Your commander has encountered
description: Your commander has encountered a strange tribe in the swamp. They seem gullible and can probably be bought with wine, trinkets and pearls of glass. [Toad Tribe Settlement]

name: A huntsman has found fresh tra
description: A huntsman has found fresh tracks at the old C'tissian ruins. Some kind of sign was drawn in brownish red on a stone slab in the center of the ruins. One of the theurgs might be able to interpret it. [Ancient Temple of C'tis]

name: The Theurg has investigated th
description: The Theurg has investigated the old ruins. The sign scribbled in goat blood is of necromantic origin. If given some time, he should be able to find out more.

name: Your Theurg has encountered a
description: Your Theurg has encountered a Necromancer in the ruins! A battle ensued.

name: Your Theurg has unveiled a Nec
description: Your Theurg has unveiled a Necromancer in the ruins! Having had premonitions of this encounter, your servant was accompanied by some men from the local garrison.

name: After the battle, some items w
description: After the battle, some items were found in the Necromancers camp. They seem to originate from the old ruins. One of the old scrolls contained mystical wisdom in hieroglyphic script, concerning the ancient necromantic arts. [Doom Glaive]

name: Your Theurg has unveiled a Nec
description: Your Theurg has unveiled a Necromancer in the ruins! After a brief struggle, the man gave up and has now been persuaded to work for the Pythian administration.

name: A barbarian horde has attacked
description: A barbarian horde has attacked and pillaged our province.

name: Some barbarian scouts have bee
description: Some barbarian scouts have been caught and interrogated. They seem to have been preparing for a large-scale attack!

description: A group of tritons has attacked the province in an attempt to take control.

description: Some squires have been caught and interrogated. They seem to have been preparing for a large-scale attack!

name: A huge barbarian horde has att
description: A huge barbarian horde has attacked and pillaged the province. The attack seem to have been well planned.

name: Some barbarian scouts have bee
description: Some barbarian scouts have been caught and interrogated. They refused to say anything about their purpose.

name: A Satyr has been caught, skulk
description: A Satyr has been caught, skulking by the military encampments.

name: A tribe of Centaurs and their
description: A tribe of Centaurs and their allies have attacked in an attempt to drive your forces from the forest!

name: An order of knights have taken
description: An order of knights have taken upon themselves to protect this land and uphold the law. [Knightly Order]

name: The Knights are funding defens
description: The Knights are funding defenses. [Knightly Order]

name: The Knights of the Order are b
description: The Knights of the Order are bringing order to the troubled realm. [Knightly Order]

name: One of the knights at The Orde
description: One of the knights at The Order has completed a Quest. During his adventures he found a magical object, which the Order donated to the treasury. [Knightly Order]

name: Some knights from The Order ha

name: One of the knights at The Orde

description: The temple foundation was sloppily built, leading to faults in the construction. Pillars and walls have collapsed. Repairs were costly and some followers have not bothered to attend mass lately.

description: People have tired of your oppressive rule!

description: The younger brother of a local noble has hired a band of mercenaries and is now trying to take control of the province!

name: An unnatural plague has swept
description: An unnatural plague has swept the province, killing thousands. Magical gems were found in the decaying corpses. Rumors of the mythical Crown of Darkness have circulated in the province ever since. [Crown of Darkness]

name: Local legends speak of a great
description: Local legends speak of a great Mage King that once ruled these lands. There came a time of decline, when magic and wonder drained from the realm. The wise King used his craft to preserve his citadel and his magical servants from harm, sealing it in the hidden realm with strong spells. Mayhap one greatly skilled in Astral Magic could find out more. [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: Your mage has found traces of
description: Your mage has found traces of subtle yet powerful enchantments in some old ruins far from civilization. Given time, they can probably be unraveled. [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: The old spells have been broke
description: The old spells have been broken! Suddenly the ruined citadel has come to life once more! Its walls have risen, banners fly from the parapets and the courtyard bustles with activity. Within the Great Hall the Mage King once more holds court! [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: Your mage has dabbled in arts
description: Your mage has dabbled in arts he does not fully master. During attempts to unravel the enchantments resting in this place, a magical flux has conjured beings of pure magic to attack the province! [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: The old spells have been broke
description: The old spells have been broken! Suddenly the ruined citadel has come to life once more! Its walls have risen, banners fly from the parapets and the courtyard bustles with activity. Within the Great Hall the Mage King once more holds court! [Citadel of the Mage King]

name: Local legends speak of a time
description: Local legends speak of a time long ago when a powerful Necromancer held the land in terror with his undead servants. They say he found the secret of immortality. A hundred years passed before a group of heroes brought down his evil rule. The Necromancer could not be killed however, so supposedly he still hides in his secret lair, waiting for a chance to once more rise to power. Perhaps one greatly skilled in the Dark Arts could find his abode. [Necromancer's Lair]

name: Your mage has found traces of
description: Your mage has found traces of subtle yet powerful magic in some old ruins far from civilization. Given time, it can probably be unraveled. [Necromancer's Lair]

name: The old spells have been broke

description: The Dragon has been slain! Its scales have been fashioned into suits of magical armor, its gem-studded belly plundered. The world is poorer without such a fabulous creature. [Red Dragon Scale Mail]

name: Hunters report strange sightin
description: Hunters report strange sightings from the forest. An area deep in the woods has become impassable from a sudden eruption of thorn and bramble that seem to move slowly, almost as if directed by an unknown force of will. Someone greatly skilled in nature magic may be able to pass the barrier. A less subtle option could be to burn a passage. [Tower of Thorns]

name: A nature mage has used the cra
description: A nature mage has used the craft to make passage through the bramble. In the heart of the forest, a tower of thorn rises! The hedge surrounding it resists attempts to pass, but may yield in time.[Tower of Thorns]

description: The corpse of an unfortunate adventurer has been found in the thorn, with some items of value. The magic protecting this place is strong. More time is needed to clear the way.[Tower of Thorns]

description: The Tower of Thorns have been reached! Within resides a powerful mage. He has grudgingly accepted to yield to your power and wisdom. [Tower of Thorns]

name: With magical fire some of the
description: With magical fire some of the thorn has been cleared. It grows back quickly however, so more time is needed. In the ashes some magical gems were found.[Tower of Thorns]

name: A fabulous peacock has been fo
description: A fabulous peacock has been found. Within its eggs lie magical gems!

name: The forest has grown wild. Tho
description: The forest has grown wild. Thorns and bramble make the footpaths impassable, wild beast prey upon cattle and travelers alike. This has hampered trade and hindered access to the forest.

name: The forest has grown wild. Tho
description: The forest has grown wild. Thorns and bramble make the footpaths impassable, wild beast prey upon cattle and travelers alike. This has hampered trade and hindered access to the forest.

name: The power of the forest spirit
description: The power of the forest spirits have grown. They are now trying to claim the province for themselves!

name: The wild beasts have grown in
description: The wild beasts have grown in number lately, coming near settlements and harassing travelers. Now a pack of wolves have attacked one of the villages, forcing the local defence to intervene. Some peasants have joined the soldiers.

name: An evil necromancer is trying
description: An evil necromancer is trying to drive his mortal enemy, a cunning animist, from the forest. The governor of the province has sided with the animist, who will probably be loyal to your cause if he survives.

name: Commoners speak of ill omens
description: Commoners speak of ill omens and strange creatures that prowl the kelp forests at night. A handful of death gems have been found in the belly of a sea-goat.

name: A dead goat has been found flo
description: A dead goat has been found floating near the shore. In its rotting belly a handful of death gems were found.

name: A fertility festival was held
description: A fertility festival was held in the province. Cattle were sacrificed to a local bloodthirsty deity and faith is decreasing. Consequently the kelp harvest was very good and tax collection has increased.

name: Recent turmoil has been subdue
description: Recent turmoil has been subdued by the competent garrison commander.

name: Those are pearls that were his
description: Those are pearls that were his eyes! In the eye sockets of some drowned sailors astral pearls were found.

name: A local gravedigger has heard
description: A local gravedigger has heard scratching and howling from beneath the stone slab covering an old grave. He refuses to open it unless a Black Priest is present. [Black Forest]

name: The grave has been opened unde
description: The grave has been opened under the supervision of a Black Priest. Underneath the heavy stone slab a vampire was trapped! It has now joined your cause.

name: The Time of the Northmen is at
description: The Time of the Northmen is at hand! They worship a heathen Idol, paying him tribute in blood and plunder! If it is destroyed, their resolve may weaken.

name: The Northmen settlers have bee
description: The Northmen settlers have been driven from the land, their war leaders killed. No more will their fleets bring havoc to troubled shores across the world! Some of the spoils of their plunder has been recovered.

name: Storms have destroyed many of
description: Storms have destroyed many of the raiding fleets that have been harrying coasts all across the world. The scourge of the Northmen has ended!

name: A fleet of Dragon-headed ships
description: A fleet of Dragon-headed ships have been sighted at sea.

name: Northmen have attacked from th
description: Northmen have attacked from the sea! They come in numbers and seem purposeful in their attacks.

name: Northmen have attacked from th
description: Northmen have attacked from the sea!

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: Longships have been repelled f
description: Longships have been repelled from our shores by brave defenders! People praise their Lord!

name: Longships have been repelled f
description: Longships have been repelled from our shores by brave defenders! People praise their Lord!

description: Northmen raiders have sailed up the river to pillage the poorly defended land.

name: Northmen! Raiders have sailed
description: Northmen! Raiders have sailed up the river to pillage the poorly defended land.

description: A small band of northmen has been encountered. It seemed they were scouting the area.

name: Lord save us from the wrath of
description: Lord save us from the wrath of the Northmen! Your people cry your name in anguish while raiders from the sea bear down upon the land.

name: The Scourge of the Northmen ha
description: The Scourge of the Northmen has been put to an end, their false Idol destroyed and their elders put to the sword by one of the Pretender Gods. No more will they be sent to plunder across the seas.

name: Bands of raiding northmen have
description: Bands of raiding northmen have killed and plundered in the borderlands! Virgins were spared and transported towards their main camp.

description: The sorcerous Idol of the Northmen has been paid tribute in virgin blood! ItÂ´s burgeoning power can be felt emanating from ##landname##.

description: The Idol of the Northmen has been libated in virgin blood! It is growing in power.

name: The Idol has cast a powerful e
description: The Idol has cast a powerful enchantment! Reaching into the realm of the fallen warriors, it has summoned them back to fight alongside his mortal servants!

description: The Idol is behung with offerings. [Effigy of War]

name: The Horror Cult has taken root
description: The Horror Cult has taken root! People pay secret offerings to these alien powers, foolishly hoping to escape their wrath. Their souls have been lost and further prayers to save them are futile.

name: A leader of the Horror Cult is
description: A leader of the Horror Cult is spreading his blasphemies in secret! Unless found and dealt with, the Cult will grow in power and influence!

name: Attracted by the activities of
description: Attracted by the activities of the local Cult, Evil has struck the land!

description: The Horror Cult has gained foothold! It seems to be spreading from an adjacent province.

name: Attracted by the activities of
description: Attracted by the activities of the local Cult, Evil has struck the land!

name: Villagers claim their infant c
description: Villagers claim their infant children have grown unnaturally ugly. Some have scorned their mothers' breasts and have strange cravings. This is mostly rejected as nonsense by wiser folks.

name: One of your commanders has bee
description: One of your commanders has been waylaid and attacked!

name: The son of a noble has been se
description: The son of a noble has been set upon by trolls while hunting in the foothills! The local garrison came to aid when hearing the sound of his horn. If he survives, the young man will probably join your cause.

name: Trolls have attacked! They are
description: Trolls have attacked! They are uncharacteristically well equipped and seem to fight with purpose.

name: A goatherd claims to have seen
description: A goatherd claims to have seen a gilded gate in the side of a mountain. When he approached, it vanished. Perhaps a mage skilled in illusions or earth magic should be sent to investigate.

name: Your mage has found a minuscul
description: Your mage has found a minuscule crack in a sheer cliff side, tracing the outline of a large gate. Some primordial magic is hiding it and preventing it from being opened. A laboratory is needed at the site to study this magic if it is to be dispelled.

name: A group of trolls have emerged
description: A group of trolls have emerged from the mountain at night, attacking the laboratory!

name: There has been a breakthrough
description: There has been a breakthrough in the studies of the gate! The magics hiding it have been thwarted. A beautiful stone gate, inlaid with golden bands and runes, has been revealed and lead into the mountain. According to the inscriptions this is the gate to the fabled Halls of the Mountain King. Will you send an army to invade his realm, or a diplomat to parlay?

name: Your men have entered the moun
description: Your men have entered the mountain, following corridors roughly cut into the rock. Emerging in a large chamber, they encountered a troll in strange livery, bespeaking them. âIn the name of King Underneath, I advise you to come no further. Turn back and you will know his gratitude. Persist, and you will be crushed like tender thrush-eggs under his foot!â

name: Pushing further into the mount
description: Pushing further into the mountain, your army has been attacked by trolls. They are led by a huge specimen, clad in bronze armor, wearing a crown upon his head. His battle bellow puts fear into the hearts of men.[Midget Masher]

name: The Troll King has been defeat
description: The Troll King has been defeated and his realm destroyed! In his halls were fabulous treasures gathered for hundreds of years. [Ruined Halls of the Mountain King]

name: Your servant has entered the m
description: Your servant has entered the mountain, following corridors roughly cut into the rock. After some time, a troll in strange livery approached. âThe King Underneath suggests a treaty! Leave these halls for good and he will share his wealth and even come to your aid if enemies threaten. Remain, and you will feel his anger!â A mage with knowledge of the path of Earth or one skilled in illusions would perhaps be able to travel deeper without being seen. Otherwise it is probably wise to follow the heralds advice and leave the province with all your men.

name: Your servant has entered the m
description: Your servant has entered the mountain, following corridors roughly cut into the rock. After some time, a troll in strange livery approached. âThe King Underneath suggests a treaty! Leave these halls for good and he will share his wealth and even come to your aid if enemies threaten. Remain, and you will feel his anger!â A mage with knowledge of the path of Earth or one skilled in illusions would perhaps be able to travel deeper without being seen. Otherwise it is probably wise to follow the heralds advice and leave the province with all your men.

name: Your cunning mage has been abl
description: Your cunning mage has been able to trick the guardian of the mountain and travel unseen into the depths, using the Path of Earth to blend into the rock. The treasure vault of King KvÃ¤lmu has been pilfered for some of its wealth!

description: Your cunning mage has been able to trick the guardian of the mountain and travel unseen into the depths, using the Path of Earth to blend into the rock. The treasure vault of King KvÃ¤lmu has been pilfered for some of its wealth!

description: Your cunning mage has been able to trick the guardian of the mountain and travel unseen into the depths, using illusions to bypass the guardians. The treasure vault of King KvÃ¤lmu has been pilfered for some of its wealth!

description: Your cunning mage has been able to trick the guardian of the mountain and travel unseen into the depths, using illusions to bypass the guardians. The treasure vault of King KvÃ¤lmu has been pilfered for some of its wealth!

description: Your mage has used Arcane Skill to travel unseen into the mountain realm. Unfortunately the trick did not work.

name: Your mage has used Arcane Skil
description: Your mage has used Arcane Skill to travel unseen into the mountain realm. Unfortunately the trick did not work.

name: The mountain gate has been sea
description: The mountain gate has been sealed anew. In a nearby stream large nuggets of gold and silver have been found! Each month some more can be harvested, sometimes along with magical gems. [Halls of the Mountain King]

name: Your mage has found a minuscul
description: Your mage has found a minuscule crack in a sheer cliff side, tracing the outline of a large gate. Some primordial magic is hiding it and preventing it from being opened. A laboratory is needed at the site to study this magic if it is to be dispelled.

name: The King of the Mountain has s
description: The King of the Mountain has spoken and will not be swayed!

name: You have withdrawn from the mo
description: You have withdrawn from the mountain and after the night of the dark moon, the mountain gate was found sealed anew. In a nearby stream large nuggets of gold and silver have been found!

name: Your mage has tried to trick t
description: Your mage has tried to trick the guardian of the mountain. The Troll Kings anger has been stirred!

name: Your mage has tried to trick t
description: Your mage has tried to trick the guardian of the mountain. The Troll Kings anger has been stirred!

description: One of your commanders has been waylaid and attacked!

description: An adventurer has come to aid, lured by the fabled riches of the Mountain King.

description: A group of adventurers has come to your aid. They seek the fabled riches of the Mountain King.

name: An adventurer has come to aid,
description: An adventurer has come to aid, lured by the fabled riches of the Mountain King.

name: One of your mages has studied
description: One of your mages has studied the gate, but no way to open it has been discovered yet. More time is needed.

name: Troll dung has been found at t
description: Troll dung has been found at the edge of the forest. They usually don't travel this close to settlements unless bent on mischief.

name: Trolls!
description: Trolls!

description: Troll dung has been found at the outskirts of a village. They usually don't travel this close to settlements unless bent on mischief.

name: Trolls!
description: Trolls!

name: People have been disappearing
description: People have been disappearing in the area around the highlands. [Mist Covered Highlands]

name: Travelers have disappeared in
description: Travelers have disappeared in the mist covered highlands. The thick mists there seem almost unnatural. [Mist Covered Highlands]

name: People have been disappearing
description: People have been disappearing in the area around the highlands. [Mist Covered Highlands]

name: People have been disappearing
description: People have been disappearing in the area around the highlands. [Mist Covered Highlands]

name: Phantasmal warriors have appea
description: Phantasmal warriors have appeared from within the Mist Covered Highlands. They seem directed by an unknown force of will.

name: A man has appeared. He seeks t
description: A man has appeared. He seeks to unveil the secret of the Mist Covered Highlands. [Mist Covered Highlands]

name: Some extra gems have been foun
description: Some extra gems have been found in the Mist Covered Highlands this month.[Mist Covered Highlands]

name: Phantasmal warriors and beasts
description: Phantasmal warriors and beasts are emerging in great numbers from the Mist Covered Highlands.

name: A host of fog-shrouded warrior
description: A host of fog-shrouded warriors have emerged from The Mist Covered Highlands. They are led by a man of power.

name: One of your agents has investi
description: One of your agents has investigated the magic of the Highlands and, when lost in its dense mists, found a cache of magic gems and an item of power. It seemed someone had hidden them on purpose.

name: Suddenly, the air has come to
description: Suddenly, the air has come to life and attacked one of your commanders!

name: A storm has struck! From the r
description: A storm has struck! From the roiling clouds, air elementals have formed. [Bag of Winds]

name: A host of fog-shrouded warrior
description: A host of fog-shrouded warriors have emerged from The Mist Covered Highlands. They are led by a man of power.

name: After the recent battle, the c
description: After the recent battle, the corpse of the mage was plundered. In his pockets were found a strange object. It seems to be some kind of compass. Following its lead, your men have traveled into the mists and found a place of power. Hidden at the heart of the highlands lies a lake from which mist constantly rises. Through the veils a translucent tower can be seen. [Translucent Tower]

name: Plague is spreading among the
description: Plague is spreading among the populace.

name: There are rumors of plague in
description: There are rumors of plague in a neighboring province. People are suspicious of foreigners and trade has been hampered. Armed men could probably seal the borders, but this would further decrease commerce.

name: Plague is spreading among the
description: Plague is spreading among the populace.

name: The rumors of plague seems to
description: The rumors of plague seems to have been false. People praise your mercy and pay offerings of thanks at the altars!

name: The plague has subsided.
description: The plague has subsided.

name: The plague is still reaping bo
description: The plague is still reaping both young and old. Prayers for mercy are whispered at your shrines!

name: The plague is still reaping bo
description: The plague is still reaping both young and old. Your priests preach that only more offerings and prayers can bring an end to suffering.

name: Winter has come, reducing comm
description: Winter has come, reducing commerce and travel. This has also hindered the plague from spreading.

name: Winter has come, reducing comm
description: Winter has come, reducing commerce and travel. This has also hindered the plague from spreading.

name: Your armies are protecting the
description: Your armies are protecting the borders and have succeeded in containing the plague.

name: A cult has emerged in the wake
description: A cult has emerged in the wake of the recent plague. According to its dogma disease is a blessing, for only through suffering can the holy mysteries be revealed. Perhaps it would be wise to suppress this heresy by erecting a temple of the true faith or sending priests to preach the true tenets to the people.

name: A glorious temple has been bui
description: A glorious temple has been built! Followers flock to the novelty and turn to the true faith. The Plague Cult has waned into oblivion.

name: The plague has subsided.
description: The plague has subsided.

name: The plague is still reaping bo
description: The plague is still reaping both young and old. Your priests preach that only more offerings and prayers can bring an end to suffering.

description: Your divine presence has purged Evil from the land, aided by some summary executions of Cult worshipers.

name: A charismatic leader has emerg
description: A charismatic leader has emerged among the plague cultists. A skilled priest may be able to sway him into the fold of true faith, before his subversive teachings cause further trouble.

name: Your High Priest has been able
description: Your High Priest has been able to convince the leaders of the Plague Cult that they must act in accordance with your will.

name: Your priest has been able to c
description: Your priest has been able to convince the leaders of the Plague Cult that they must act in accordance with your will.

name: The leaders of the Plague Cult

description: The Plague Cult has been eradicated!

description: Some evil force is at work. The dead in an old graveyard have been restless. A powerful priest should be sent to lay them to rest. Or perhaps a necromancer could use this flux of unholy power to your advantage? [Graveyard of the Damned]

description: Undead have emerged from the old graveyard. The necromancer has not been able to control them!

description: The Fertility Cult is gaining followers and influence! Priests should be sent to lead the lost into the fold. The strength of your divine presence will purge this heresy from the land! Another option would be to send an army to root out the cult leaders.

name: Your armies have been put to t
description: Your armies have been put to the task of purging the province from cult worship. Followers have been harassed and arrested on scarce evidence, their leaders forced to abjure their faith or be hanged.

name: Your armies have been put to t
description: Your armies have been put to the task of purging the province from cult worship. Followers have been harassed and arrested on scarce evidence. 'Sacred' groves have been burnt and parts of the forest put to the axe. In spite of this, the cult persists.

name: Your armies have been put to t
description: Your armies have been put to the task of purging the province from cult worship. Followers have been harassed and arrested on scarce evidence. 'Sacred' groves have been burnt and parts of the forest put to the axe. In spite of this, the cult persists.

name: Loosing its leader, the Fertil
description: Loosing its leader, the Fertility Cult has wilted. However, like weed in the garden it must be rooted out by faith or sword lest it return again.

name: Men have been lost in the wood
description: Men have been lost in the woods. Locals say a dryad has lured them. A nature mage may be able to cull some secrets from her.

name: Your mage has found the dryad.
description: Your mage has found the dryad. Angered by probing questions she has cursed the land!

name: Your mage has found the dryad
description: Your mage has found the dryad and culled some of her secrets.

name: The dryad no longer lingers in
description: The dryad no longer lingers in these woods.

name: The forces of nature are tryin
description: The forces of nature are trying to reclaim this land!

name: The Throne of Law has been cla
description: The Throne of Law has been claimed by a righteous pretender. Justice and order permeates through the spheres. [The Throne of Law]

description: Your farmers have angered a vengeful entity of the wild. A monster boar is now ravaging the province. Farmers are afraid to enter their fields and refuse to work. Unrest is slowly growing. You must send a group of hunters to find the dire pig and slay it lest unrest will continue to rise.

description: Disease is spreading.

description: The recent plague has hampered trade. Hopefully this will also contain the disease.

description: An unusual amount of dead rats have been found floating in the harbor.

name: A ship has come from a distant
description: A ship has come from a distant land. After having been accepted ashore several of the crew members died with blackened limbs and lumps in their armpits. The ship has now been burnt together with the sloppy harbormaster. Hopefully it was not to late.

name: Plague!
description: Plague!

name: Plague!
description: Plague!

name: Disease is spreading.
description: Disease is spreading.

name: A cult has emerged in the wake
description: A cult has emerged in the wake of the recent plague. According to its dogma disease is a blessing, for only through suffering can the holy mysteries be revealed. Perhaps it would be wise to suppress this heresy by erecting a temple of the true faith or sending priests to preach the true tenets to the people.

name: An unnatural plague has swept
description: An unnatural plague has swept the province, killing thousands. Magical gems were found in the decaying corpses. Rumors of the mythical Crown of Darkness have circulated in the province ever since.

name: The governor of the province h
description: The governor of the province has died from the plague. His successor is incompetent.

name: A new breed of mosquitoes are
description: A new breed of mosquitoes are infesting the swamps, spreading disease in the area.

name: Miasmatic fumes are rising fro
description: Miasmatic fumes are rising from the swamps, spreading disease in the area.

name: A wealthy merchant suffering f
description: A wealthy merchant suffering from the plague has donated all his gold to get rid of the affliction.

name: A wealthy and faithful noble h
description: A wealthy and faithful noble has died from the plague. She had willed her fortunes to the temple.

name: A village succumbed to the pla
description: A village succumbed to the plague is said to be haunted by the ghosts of its victims. [Haunted Village]

name: A plague has struck the land.
description: A plague has struck the land. Empty cabins and rotting corpses litter the landscape. People are suspicious of foreigners, which has hampered trade.

name: Bubonic plague is spreading.

name: Your mages have studied the Ga
description: Your mages have studied the Gate. There are three of these portals and of increasing power. When opened, travel from the realms beyond is facilitated, making it easier for demons to manifest all across the world of men. When the Second Gate opens, the lords of hell themselves may be able to manifest! The power of pure faith may be able to close the gates, or perhaps a master of blood magic could be able to control them. If further studied, some insights into the workings of the nether realms may be gained. However, it may be dangerous to linger near.

name: More people have turned from t
description: More people have turned from the true faith. If a temple is built your preachers may yet turn wickedness from the hearts of the people.

name: One of your servants has found
description: One of your servants has found an item hidden in the home of a prominent citizen. [Blood Pendant]

name: Your informants whisper that t
description: Your informants whisper that the Cult seems to be preparing for some special occasion. Strange apparel and ingredients have been acquired by cult followers. Perhaps prayer will suffice to banish the evil forces, but an armed search by at least a score men may be needed. Another option could be to send one capable in the infernal arts to infiltrate the cult.

description: Your informants whisper that the Cult seems to be preparing for some special occasion. Strange apparel and ingredients have been acquired by cult followers. Perhaps prayer will suffice to banish the evil forces, but an armed search by at least a score men may be needed. Another option could be to send one capable in the infernal arts to infiltrate the cult.

name: Your temple has been desecrate
description: Your temple has been desecrated! Evil symbols were written in blood on its altar and the remains of a human sacrifice was found. An armed search may be necessary to find the evildoers.

name: One of your servants has disap
description: One of your servants has disappeared mysteriously.

name: A knight has appeared, on a qu
description: A knight has appeared, on a quest against evil. [Herald Lance]

name: A pentagram has been found in
description: A pentagram has been found in the basement of a town house! [Pentagram]

name: Some blood slaves have been li
description: Some blood slaves have been liberated from a secret dungeon.

name: One of the initiates in the De
description: One of the initiates in the Demon Cult has been caught and interrogated. Before swallowing his tongue, the man boasted that his brethren are going to summon the prince of Hell to rule this land and reward his servants! Your men have some hints of where this summoning will take place and may be able to interfere in time to stop it.

name: A cabal of sorcerers have been
description: A cabal of sorcerers have been caught in the act of human sacrifice! Gathering in the basement of a town house, they were interrupted when trying to summon a greater demon from beyond. A battle ensued! [Brazen Vessel]

name: The Demon Cult has been shatte
description: The Demon Cult has been shattered and the possessions of its followers claimed by the church!

description: The Demon Cult has brought one of the Demon Lords into this world! People flee in panic as they and their master revel in killing the innocents. [Demon Whip]

name: Your blood mage has been able
description: Your blood mage has been able o infiltrate the Demon Cult. He reports they are preparing for a major summoning.

name: Your mage has partaken in the
description: Your mage has partaken in the summoning of a greater demon. Being highly skilled, he managed to trick the fiend into serving him instead of the cabal.

name: Your mage has witnessed the su
description: Your mage has witnessed the summoning of a greater demon!

name: Your ardent priests have been
description: Your ardent priests have been able to sway some of the lost into the fold of true faith. The sinners have repented and confessed. Former cult members have revealed the secret location of the summoning circle where the cult plans to conduct their black magic. It would be wise to swiftly send some armed men to deal with the leaders before they try something desperate.

name: Your ardent priests have been
description: Your ardent priests have been able to sway some of the lost into the fold of true faith. The sinners have repented and confessed. Former cult members have revealed the secret location of the cabal leaders and born-anew citizens have formed a possy to deal with the evildoers!

name: Your blood mage has been able
description: Your blood mage has been able to infiltrate the Cult and lead your men to its secret hideout. A cabal of sorcerers was caught in the act of human sacrifice! Gathering in the basement of a town house, they were interrupted when trying to summon a greater demon from beyond. A battle ensued! [Brazen Vessel]

name: A warlock has been caught and
description: A warlock has been caught and his blood slaves liberated. When pressured, the man revealed the whereabouts the demon-worshiping cabal that is probably the center of the Cult. At least a handful of men will be needed to find and deal with it.

name: One of your mages has found a
description: One of your mages has found a blasphemous book hidden at the home of a suspected Cult member. After reading it, the pages smoldered.

name: An angel of the host has desce
description: An angel of the host has descended to aid in the fight against evil!

name: Your informants claim that one
description: Your informants claim that one of the local nobles is involved in Cult worship. Rumors say he never leaves his house at daytime. A mage skilled in blood magic may be able to find proof of his involvement in the deviant practices, or perhaps your churchmen may be able to find out more.

name: A pious servant of the suspect
description: A pious servant of the suspected nobleman has confessed that unholy rites are indeed taking place at his manor. The man is willing to lead your men there and suggests to bring a good number of them, for his lord is unnaturally strong and has loyal men about him.

name: A corpse has been found, drain
description: A corpse has been found, drained of blood.

name: Your blood mage has found sign
description: Your blood mage has found signs of a demonic presence in the nobleman's manor. The place is well guarded, so a fair number of men will be needed to make an arrest.

name: Your men have staged an attack
description: Your men have staged an attack on the manor of the demon-worshiping nobleman. They were confronted by the lord himself and his demonic servants!

name: Your men have staged an attack
description: Your men have staged an attack on the manor of the demon-worshiping nobleman. They were confronted by the lord himself and the demon that has trapped his soul. [Hell Sword]

name: A lion has been slaying sheep.
description: A lion has been slaying sheep. It hides in the wilderness and will avoid large groups of men, but a single hero with some men-at-arms may be able to hunt it down.

name: A shepherd was found killed an
description: A shepherd was found killed and half eaten by a beast. Probably the lion.

name: More cattle have been eaten. P
description: More cattle have been eaten. People are afraid to go near the wilderness. They say the bailiff is a coward and that the fine folks in the capital donÂ´t care about commoners getting killed.

name: More cattle have been killed.
description: More cattle have been killed. People are blaming the lords for not providing safety.

name: Someone has seen the lion! It
description: Someone has seen the lion! It was described as huge, with fangs like spearheads and claws like longswords, its eyes burning with rage.

name: Your men have seen no trace of
description: Your men have seen no trace of the lion. It probably hides when larger groups of men approach.

name: The beast has been tracked to
description: The beast has been tracked to its den in the wilderness! A heroic battle was fought!

name: The beast has been tracked to
description: The beast has been tracked to its den in the wilderness. However, it seems not to have been a lion after all! A heroic battle was fought...

description: Undead haunt this forest! [Forest of the Dead]

name: Dark tales are told in the inn
description: Dark tales are told in the inns bordering the wasteland. They speak of a previous age when this land was verdant and its cities the envy of kings. One man ruled the emerging civilization. When nearing the end of his days, he turned to Dark Arts to prolong his life and his rule. This corrupted the king's soul and in the end he used the lifeforce of all his subjects and that of the fertile land itself to avoid death. The kingdom was laid to waste, its soil barren and its people destroyed, their bleached bones littering the land. Some say his magic still lingers. Some say the ruins deep in the wasteland are no longer silent and that the lamentation of its long lost inhabitants can be heard faintly when the desert wind blows from the east.

name: The Evil that once laid waste
description: The Evil that once laid waste to this land has awoken! From his dark fortress at the heart of the wasteland, the Necromancer sends forth his minions to claim the land. Only the strength of faith will hold his dark power at bay! [Necromancer's Lair]

name: The necromancer himself has ap
description: The necromancer himself has appeared! [Robe of Invulnerability]

description: The Necromancer is defeated! His shadow has lifted from the surrounding land.

name: People have begun living in fe
description: People have begun living in fear of the Necromancer. Some trade their loyalty in exchange for life.

name: Agents of the Necromancer have
description: Agents of the Necromancer have been at work in the province.

description: Apparitions walk the land at night.

name: Your priests have put faith in
description: Your priests have put faith into the hearts of the people. The Necromancer's influence has waned.

description: Your dominion counteracts the Necromancer's power!

name: People find solace in your tem
description: People find solace in your temple.

name: The dead walk! Graves have ope
description: The dead walk! Graves have opened, the doors of mausoleums shattered, newly dead rise during their wake to bring terror to the mourners.

name: A dread plague has swept the l
description: A dread plague has swept the land! None have been left untouched by death or sorrow.

name: The necromancer has sent his m
description: The necromancer has sent his minions to claim the land!

description: The necromancer has sent his minions to claim the land!

description: The necromancer extends his power!

name: A curse has been put upon all
description: A curse has been put upon all living! Cattle die, their bellies bloated like the victims of famine. The fruits of birth are stillborn. Crops wither in the fields, leaving nothing but ash. People cannot tolerate to live in such a place and have emigrated in large numbers. Many have died prematurely, their years of health seemingly vanished overnight! [Withered Land]

name: The Necromancer has sucked the
description: The Necromancer has sucked the force of life from a whole land! Strengthened by that unwholesome power he may rise to challenge the gods!

name: An apparition has been sent to
description: An apparition has been sent to kill one of your commanders.

name: Your servant has found and exp
description: Your servant has found and explored an Ancient Tomb, but was attacked by its undead inhabitant! [Ancient Tomb]

name: Your servant has found and exp
description: Your servant has found and explored an Ancient Tomb. When an item of power was pilfered from the grave offerings, the dead lord rose in anger from his peaceful rest!  [Ancient Tomb]

name: Rhianne has revealed the lair
description: Rhianne has revealed the lair of some brigands! [Brigand Lair]

description: A great storm has blown for many days. Some say that an angel of mercy rode the clouds and blew away all evil from the land.

name: A flux of unholy power lashes
description: A flux of unholy power lashes through the ether! It emanates from this province.

name: Children have been disappearin
description: Children have been disappearing from settlements close to the woods. The villagers demand that someone look into the matter. At least a handful of men will be needed to effectively search the area.

name: With the aid of a local pathfi
description: With the aid of a local pathfinder, the outskirts of the deep forest has been searched. A grisly heap of small carcasses has been found. Perhaps the remains of rabbits eaten by a wolf?

name: Pushing deep into the forest,
description: Pushing deep into the forest, the group of local soldiers accompanying your men has mysteriously disappeared!

name: Legend has come true! At the h
description: Legend has come true! At the heart of the deep forest, your men have encountered a Lamia Queen and her ensorcelled servants. With madness and malice glowing in her eyes, the Queen orders her minions to attack...

name: The Lamia Queen has been defea
description: The Lamia Queen has been defeated! Within her abode were found forgotten treasures and the belongings of her victims.

name: Your agent has found hints in
description: Your agent has found hints in local tales and legends of similar events in a time long gone. Supposedly, the queen of this land lost all her children to evil sorcery. In her grief, she went mad and commanded her subjects to gather the infants of the land for her to feed upon. The truth of these stories is questionable, as they are mostly used to scare children into obedience.

name: Young men have been disappeari
description: Young men have been disappearing, leaving their beds empty at the night of the full moon.

name: Travelers have disappeared in
description: Travelers have disappeared in the woods. Rumors have spread and merchants are wary of bandits, choosing other routes for trade.

description: Tensions are rising over the practices of the Ravens Vale Seraphs. There has been manifestations of civil unrest in the capital. Only the wisdom of an Eagle King will calm the opposing factions.

description: A group of renegades have attacked the province! They are led by an exiled Harab Seraph.

description: There have been rumors of a plague brought upon the land by practice of unclean magic. This has lead to unrest among the populace and hostility towards the inhabitants of Ravens Vale.

name: The mere presence of a descend
description: The mere presence of a descendant of the Yazatas is enough to placate the agitated realm.

name: Some Iceclads have volunteered
description: Some Iceclads have volunteered to patrol the land and subdue any disloyal protests.

name: The presence of a descendant o
description: The presence of a descendant of the Yazatas has placated the capital, but dissent remains. Many of the Raptorians feel their clan has been wronged by the courts lately when disputes have been settled to the advantage of the Airyas.

description: The province has been raided by a band of renegade raptorians! [Palace of the Eagle Kings]

description: There are rumors of a band of raptorians harassing travelers.[Palace of the Eagle Kings]

description: A lord of the Tempest Clan has volunteered with his men to rid the realm of the renegades.

description: Something has crossed the veil from the Shade Lands and attacked your servant!. [The Shaded Lands]

description: Energies emanating from the Arcane Gateway has affected one of your commanders, giving him unexpected influence over creatures of mystical origin. [Arcane Gateway]

description: Energies emanating from the Demon Gate has affected one of your commanders, giving him unexpected influence over creatures of mystical origin. [Demon Gate]

name: One of your commanders has ent
description: One of your commanders has entered the Cave of Dark Rites. The unspeakable ceremonies performed therein have tainted the soul of your servant. With this taint comes unexpected influence over creatures of mystical origin. [Cave of Dark Rites]

name: Energies emanating from the De
description: Energies emanating from the Demon Gate has affected one of your commanders, giving him unexpected influence over creatures of mystical origin. [Demon Gate]

name: Your mage has found The Mounta
description: Your mage has found The Mountain of Power! When climbing its peak your servant was granted a revelation of otherworldly origin, granting insights and power no mortal should bear. [The Mountain of Power].

name: TEST This event produces The M
description: TEST This event produces The Mountain of Power. Try searching with a B2 mage. [The Mountain of Power]

name: After attending a ceremony at
description: After attending a ceremony at the Blood Henge, your servant has gained unexpected influence over creatures of mystical origin. [Blood Henge]

name: One of your servants has been
description: One of your servants has been tainted by otherworldly energies, giving unexpected powers.

description: A student at the library has gained insights! [Library]

name: A forgotten tome has been foun
description: A forgotten tome has been found at the library. Hidden in a secret repository and warded by magical glyphs, it was probably meant never to be opened. Alas, one of your mages could not resist the temptation. [Library]

name: Tomb of ice appears in mountai
description: Tomb of ice appears in mountain province HIDDEN. [Tomb of Ice]

name: City of the Ancients appears H
description: City of the Ancients appears HIDDEN. [City of the Ancients]

name: The City of the Ancients has b
description: The City of the Ancients has been found! Within its legendary walls are secrets long forgotten and treasures worthy of kings! However, to find these secrets the ruins must be entered by one brave enough to face the perils within. [City of the Ancients]

name: While exploring the ancient ru
description: While exploring the ancient ruins, your servants have found an ancient scriptorium, still containing crumbling clay tablets filled with ancient lore. A sage would be able to gain much knowledge from such a wealth of documents, if allowed time and facilities for research. Lacking one learned in dead languages, one of your mages might suffice. [Ancient Scriptorium]

name: A sage has come to study at th
description: A sage has come to study at the Scriptorium. [Ancient Scriptorium]

name: A Lore Master and his apprenti
description: A Lore Master and his apprentice have come to study at the Ancient Scriptorium. [Ancient Scriptorium]

name: Your sage has studied the anci
description: Your sage has studied the ancient texts in the scriptorium. They speak of a long forgotten age, when giants walked the earth and fought battles of such magnitude that was never seen again in the world of mortals. It seems the long dead inhabitants of this city were peaceful farmers worshiping their benevolent Lord in peace and piety. Their knowledge of science, astrology and agriculture were advanced, drawing the envy of rivaling nations. From the far north came frost giants, pillaging and destroying the fertile lands with their hatred and bitterly cold winters. Their civilization threatened with destruction, the elders of the city turned to powerful magic, summoning dragons to fight the intruders. The leader of the enemy giants was killed, but still the city fell, its splendor torn down, its glorious temples destroyed and its elders beheaded in the square. The once proud city-state dwindled into obscurity, only remembered in legends. Your servant suggests further studies may yield more details of the history of the city.

name: Your Lore Master has studied t
description: Your Lore Master has studied the ancient texts in the scriptorium. name: Further information on the eve
description: Further information on the events leading to the downfall of the ancient city has been deciphered. It seems the leader of the northmen was mortally wounded and incarcerated in a tomb of ice. It was supposedly constructed somewhere in a nearby mountain range where perpetual cold would preserve the giant warleader for eternity.

name: An expedition into the mountai
description: An expedition into the mountains has located a cave opening hidden at the bottom of a rift in the great glacier crowning the mighty mountain peaks. It is sealed with huge slabs of cut stone bearing runes of frost. A sage or a powerful mage versed in the arts of water and frost magic may be able to decipher the runes, or perhaps an earth mage could somehow open the way.

name: An expedition into the mountai
description: An expedition into the mountains has located a cave opening hidden at the bottom of a rift in the great glacier crowning the mighty mountain peaks. It is sealed with huge slabs of cut stone bearing runes of frost. A sage or a powerful mage versed in the arts of water and frost magic may be able to decipher the runes, or perhaps an earth mage could somehow open the way.

name: The runes have been deciphered
description: The runes have been deciphered and their magic released, opening a way into the mountain. Following the ice-covered tunnel, a huge circular chamber has been reached. In its center rests a large sarcophagus of ice. Within lies an ancient warrior of a giant race, his battle wounds still fresh. Will you continue to plunder the treasures of the tomb, or let your mage investigate the magic of this place? [Tomb of Ice]

name: The runes have been deciphered

description: Powerful earth magic has been used o shatter the blocks of stone, opening a way into the mountain. Following the ice-covered tunnel, a huge circular chamber has been reached. name: While plundering the tomb, you
description: While plundering the tomb, your expedition has been attacked!

name: The Tomb of Ice has been plund
description: The Tomb of Ice has been plundered! When his rime hauberk was stripped from the ancient warrior giant, the corpse started bleeding profusely from its wounds and soon lay drained. Within the tomb were found great treasures. [Rime Hauberk]

name: Your mage has investigated the
description: Your mage has investigated the magic of the Tomb of Ice. It seems the sarcophagus and the armor of the dead giant is enchanted with powerful magic, preserving him through the millennia and even slowly pulling his soul from the realm of the dead back into the flesh. The makers of the tomb seem to have planned ahead, for among its treasures are inscribed slabs of stone describing the ritual that will bring the ancient war-leader to life once more! Will you continue on this perilous path or rather withdraw, plundering the tomb of its riches?

name: The Tomb of Ice has been plund
description: The Tomb of Ice has been plundered! When his rime hauberk was stripped from the ancient warrior giant, the corpse started bleeding profusely from its wounds and soon lay drained. Within the tomb were found great treasures. [Rime Hauberk]

description: The ritual described on the stone tablets has been performed, awakening the Rimturse from his long sleep! He is now bound to your service. [Rime Hauberk]

name: The ritual described on the st

description: The giant has been defeated and his tomb plundered!

name: A Rimturse from ancient times
description: A Rimturse from ancient times has been awakened in a distant land! How this has come to be is a mystery, but he has crushed his summoners and now serves your will.

description: Reset code if Niefel moves. HIDDEN.

name: As a master of all forgotten l
description: As a master of all forgotten languages, you have swiftly studied the ancient texts in the scriptorium. They speak of a distant age, when giants walked the earth and fought battles of such magnitude that was never seen again in the world of mortals. It seems the long dead inhabitants of this city were peaceful farmers worshiping their benevolent Lord in peace and piety. Their knowledge of science, astrology and agriculture were advanced, drawing the envy of rivaling nations. From the far north came frost giants, pillaging and destroying the fertile lands with their hatred and bitterly cold winters. Their civilization threatened with destruction, the elders of the city turned to powerful magic, summoning dragons to fight the intruders. The leader of the enemy giants was killed, but still the city fell, its splendor torn down, its glorious temples destroyed, its elders beheaded in the square. The once proud city-state dwindled into obscurity, only remembered in legends. You surmise this could be an account of a war between the earlier civilizations of Niefelheim and Ur. Notably, the capital of the latter was known as the First City. Further studies may yield more details.

name: There has been a theft in the
description: There has been a theft in the scriptorium! Several interesting volumes have disappeared. Among them were some recent translations of the history of the city.

name: Accounts from the fall of the
description: Accounts from the fall of the city have been found. According to one author, the attackers sought to claim some mysterious power located in the High Temple. Apparently the city was besieged and its population starved. A grisly passage describes how a zealous contingent of the temple guard began feeding upon the dead to preserve their strength for the final battle, described elsewhere by a witness: 'Without rest they fought, the chosen of the Lord, in defence of his wellspring of life, the source of Abundance. Red did it flow at the end, its purity wasted, all hope forfeit under the sword of the cold-bringers.' Perhaps the site of the temple can be found by searching the city ruins.

name: The ruins of the High Temple h
description: The ruins of the High Temple have been found! Within its broken vaults is a wellspring of clear water, bursting from the earth. From the crypts beneath, the guardians of the temple rise to defend it once more... [Wellspring of Abundance]

name: A weapons cache has been found
description: A weapons cache has been found! [Flesh Eater]

name: A small stone chest has been f
description: A small stone chest has been found. It is covered in strange runes of frost and contains magical gems.

description: The tomb of a giant warrior has been found and looted. [Frost Brand]

name: The Lake of Living Water is le
description: The Lake of Living Water is left alone, once more undisturbed by mortals. On its shores were found some unusual, polished rocks and among them magical gems. [Lake of Living Water]

description: A summoning was attempted and the Lake responded with wrath! [Lake of Living Water]
