description: Your cunning mage has managed to trap one of the elementals from the Lake. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: Insights have been gained from
description: Insights have been gained from prodding the depths of the Lake of Living Water.  [Lake of Living Water]

name: A whisper of falsehood and wic
description: A whisper of falsehood and wickedness has swept across the land. The Druj, People of the Lie, those of evil intentions, are called forth to spread the will of the destructive spirit. Rebellions, murder and thefts cause unrest and strife across the province. In its wake came the Daevas, demonic beings that thrive on destruction, and slaughter begun.

name: A pack of werewolves have been
description: A pack of werewolves have been summoned to serve the Lord of Beasts.

name: A vengeful sea hag has cursed
description: A vengeful sea hag has cursed this province.

name: A pack of sea dogs is roving t
description: A pack of sea dogs is roving the coastal lands.

name: Lately, strange howling has be
description: Lately, strange howling has been heard along the coast. People have disappeared and locals are upset. Perhaps one of your commanders should investigate.

name: Tracks on the shore reveal tha
description: Tracks on the shore reveal that groups of creatures emerge from the sea at night-time and roam the coast, probably returning at dawn. A patrolling force may be able to intercept them.

name: Some tracks were found at the
description: Some tracks were found at the shore, revealing that some kind of creatures emerge from the sea to roam the coast. Unfortunately, your men were set upon by a pack of these monsters! [Bottle of Living Water]

name: A smugglers cave was found, it
description: A smugglers cave was found, its contents claimed by the treasury.

name: Some magic pearls were found a
description: Some magic pearls were found at the shore.

name: The sea-creatures have been in
description: The sea-creatures have been intercepted! The pack is lead on a frenzied hunt by a proud ichtycentaur. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: Winter has come, putting an en
description: Winter has come, putting an end to the strange occurrences plaguing the coastal province.

name: More of the strange howling ha
description: More of the strange howling has been heard along the coast. People have disappeared and locals are upset.

name: Sea dogs are attacking the coa
description: Sea dogs are attacking the coastal settlements, lead on their frenzied hunt by a proud ichtycentaur. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: Sea dogs are attacking the coa
description: Sea dogs are attacking the coastal settlements, lead on their frenzied hunt by a proud ichtycentaur. [Bottle of Living Water]

name: The province governor has sent
description: The province governor has sent word to the capital. The inhabitants in one of the secluded fishing villages along the coast seem to be engaged in smuggling. However, all attempts to reveal this have failed and she suspects the smugglers have informants among the province officials. The governor therefore asks for aid. Perhaps someone should be sent to investigate.

name: There has been an assassinatio
description: There has been an assassination attempt!

name: Your agent sends a disturbing
description: Your agent sends a disturbing report from the coastal village. Some of the inhabitants are afflicted with a deforming disease. They walk hunchbacked and with a wobbling gait, eyes bulging from the strange fever besetting them. This has led them to seek aid with alien gods, secret worship supposedly taking place on a small island off the coast.

name: When investigating the island,
description: When investigating the island, your agent was attacked!

name: The small island has been loca
description: The small island has been located. A basalt statue of hideous visage was found in a cove, with signs of ritual worship nearby. Someone may be able to observe the activities secretly. You could also send priests to bring the lost flock into the fold or armed men to deal with this heresy by force. [Statue of Hideous Visage]

name: At the night of the dark moon,
description: At the night of the dark moon, the villagers congregated at the basalt statue, engaging in guttural prayer and hideous chanting. As the rite progressed, they were joined by deformed men crawling from the sea, led by a robed creature with tentacles sprouting from its face. The strange ritual culminated in the summoning of a monstrosity from the void!

name: The village elders have approa
description: The village elders have approached your commander, offering a deal. If you let them continue their practices in peace, they will provide a tribute of youths touched by the blessing of the sea.

name: From the secluded village emer
description: From the secluded village emerges monstrosities lured from the void by the emanations of blasphemous worship. In their wake comes a horde of half-breeds and madmen wreaking havoc on the unsuspecting populace.

name: When attacking the village, yo
description: When attacking the village, your men were met by monstrous creatures, defending it alongside the villagers!

name: You have accepted the offer of
description: You have accepted the offer of tribute. Some hybrid servants will be available each month. [Secluded Village]

name: Your priests have been able to
description: Your priests have been able to convince a majority of the people living in the corrupted fishing-village to follow the true faith. The heretics have been banished or killed and your dominion rules supreme! The province governor has funded the building of a new temple.

name: There has been an assassinatio
description: There has been an assassination attempt!

name: From the secluded village emer
description: From the secluded village emerges monstrosities lured from the void by the emanations of blasphemous worship. In their wake comes a horde of half-breeds and madmen wreaking havoc on the unsuspecting populace.

name: People have left the land, dis
description: People have left the land, disgusted by the heretical practices in some of the coastal villages. [Secluded Village]

name: Your agent has been attacked!
description: Your agent has been attacked!

name: Your dominion is not strong en
description: Your dominion is not strong enough to counter the heretic influences through prayer and sermons!

name: At the night of the dark moon,
description: At the night of the dark moon, the villagers congregated at the basalt statue, engaging in guttural prayer and hideous chanting. As the rite progressed, they were joined by deformed men crawling from the sea, led by a robed creature with tentacles sprouting from its face. The creature beckoned your servant, who eagerly joined the chanting. Afterwards a proposal was made: Leave the village to its own affairs and let the creature claim some souls now and then from the coastal settlements. In return he will bind an entity from the void to serve.

name: You have accepted the offer.
description: You have accepted the offer.

name: People have disappeared from t
description: People have disappeared from the coastal villages or while traveling the roads between them. Strange creatures are rumored to haunt the area. Some have gone mad after seeing them.

name: You have accepted the offer.
description: You have accepted the offer.

name: You have accepted the offer.
description: You have accepted the offer.

name: When refused, the starspawn br
description: When refused, the starspawn broke the peace of parlay and attacked! Now, the only option is to use force to stop the unwholesome activities in the village. [Eye of the Void]

name: From the secluded village emer
description: From the secluded village emerges monstrosities lured from the void by the emanations of blasphemous worship. In their wake comes a horde of half-breeds and madmen wreaking havoc on the unsuspecting populace.

name: Your men have gained informati
description: Your men have gained information on the whereabouts of the native resistance leaders. A thorough search by a large force of armed men may finally bring these criminals to justice.

name: The local rebellion has reache
description: The local rebellion has reached its climax. Riots are erupting everywhere! The few loyal men in the defence have been slaughtered by angry kinsmen and an all-out attack has been coordinated by the leaders of the resistance!

name: This spring, a wonderful Undin
description: This spring, a wonderful Undine was seen dancing in the waves, spreading joy and laughter in the land.

name: Magical runes on the Throne of
description: Magical runes on the Throne of Elements have been deciphered. There seems to be some kind of wards shielding the throne. Your advisers suggest further studies may be wise before claiming it. [The Throne of Elements]

name: Ancient lore concerning the cr
description: Ancient lore concerning the creation of the Throne has been found among the learned of this land. The Throne was created by four arch-mages and imbued by the emanations of the Pantokrator. On their path to ascendancy, each of the four  mages founded an order whose purpose was to protect the throne, so that one unworthy would not sit upon it. The runes on the throne are wardings of obscure purpose. There is one ward for each of the four elements.

name: You ignore the warding runes a
description: You ignore the warding runes and sit upon the Throne of Elements! A weak trembling is all that is felt from its surface. Probably, the ancient magics have faltered in the presence of your powerful aura. [The Throne of Elements]

name: With barely a thought you util
description: With barely a thought you utilize the power of astral magic to unravel the elegant but insufficient wards that surround the Throne. [The Throne of Elements]

name: The runes of the Throne have b
description: The runes of the Throne have been disturbed by the investigations, but there is no sign of any overt effects...

name: It seems the wards can be disp
description: It seems the wards can be dispelled by someone well versed in the corresponding element. According to ancient texts it must be done in a certain order, 'like the passing of the seasons'. There are also hints in local lore that the guardians of the throne will only appear during springtime.

name: A master of air magic has unra
description: A master of air magic has unraveled the first rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: Spring has come, and yet the m
description: Spring has come, and yet the magic wards on the throne have not been broken. This bodes ill!

name: A master of fire magic has unr
description: A master of fire magic has unraveled the second rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: A master of earth magic has un
description: A master of earth magic has unraveled the third rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: A master of water magic has un
description: A master of water magic has unraveled the last rune of warding on the throne! Some of the gems that were locked into the spell have been retrieved.

name: Four robed men have appeared i
description: Four robed men have appeared in the province. They are masters of their respective orders, sworn to protect the Throne of Elements. You have proven worthy, and they will now serve your will.

name: A violent thunderstorm has str
description: A violent thunderstorm has struck! From the roiling sky a host of magical beings sweep down towards the Throne. They are led by a robed man. [Winged Helmet]

name: Fire ravages the countryside.
description: Fire ravages the countryside. From the flames comes a host of magical beings, led by a man of power![Red Dragon Scale Mail]

name: An earthquake has struck! In i
description: An earthquake has struck! In its wake comes monsters and spirits, led by a wizard! They march towards the Throne. [Blacksteel Plate]

name: Temperature has dropped dramat
description: Temperature has dropped dramatically during a snow storm. In its wake comes a Frost Mage and his host of magical beings, making an attempt to wrest the Throne of Elements from your grasp! [Ice Pebble Staff]

name: The guardians of the Throne ha
description: The guardians of the Throne have been defeated!

name: Prepare Necromancer event. HID
description: Prepare Necromancer event. HIDDEN. [The Throne of Death]

name: A helpful necromancer has appe
description: A helpful necromancer has appeared, confessing that you are the true Lord of the Afterlife and that none other should sit upon the Throne of Death! He claims to have secret knowledge of its workings and that if brought to the Throne, he will invoke its power in your name.

name: The Necromancer has been broug
description: The Necromancer has been brought to the Throne of Death! A lab will be needed if he is to work his sorcery.

name: The Necromancer has studied th
description: The Necromancer has studied the inscriptions and fittings on the Throne, attuning himself to its magic...

name: The Necromancer has invoked th
description: The Necromancer has invoked the power of the Throne!

name: A mortal has invoked the power
description: A mortal has invoked the power of the Throne of Death! This is clearly a violation of the Celestial Laws.

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: The Necromancer has bound the
description: The Necromancer has bound the spirits of the land in a pact. They will now rise to defend the Throne of Death! [Spirit Pact]

name: The Necromancer has grown in p
description: The Necromancer has grown in power! His cackling laughter can be heard by anyone approaching the lab.

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: Utilizing the magic of the Thr
description: Utilizing the magic of the Throne, The Necromancer has summoned the dead to fight for your cause!

name: A mortal vessel cannot hold su
description: A mortal vessel cannot hold such power as resides in the Throne of Death!

name: By the workings of the Necroma
description: By the workings of the Necromancer, some of the power of the Throne of Death has been released into the mortal realm. Now, even the souls of the living has to answer its call!

name: The veil to the Shade Lands ha
description: The veil to the Shade Lands has grown thin by the unlawful use of dark magic, disturbing its residents.

name: The Throne of War [The Throne
description: The Throne of War [The Throne of War]

name: The Throne of Night [The Thron
description: The Throne of Night [The Throne of Night]

name: The Throne of Beasts [The Thro
description: The Throne of Beasts [The Throne of Beasts]

description: The Throne of Bones [The Throne of Bones]

description: The Throne of Pestilence [The Throne of Pestilence]

name: The Throne of Gaia [The Throne
description: The Throne of Gaia [The Throne of Gaia]

name: The Throne of Elements [The Th
description: The Throne of Elements [The Throne of Elements]

name: The Throne of Death [The Thron
description: The Throne of Death [The Throne of Death]

name: Inspired by your divine presen
description: Inspired by your divine presence in their land, the faithful have built a glorious temple!

name: Inspired by your divine presen
description: Inspired by your divine presence in their land, the faithful have built a glorious temple!

name: Crypt in the sand created for
description: Crypt in the sand created for testing. [Crypt in the Sand]

name: A Crypt has been found in the
description: A Crypt has been found in the sand. The wards that bound him broken, an ancient and long forgotten King rises! [Crypt in the Sand]

name: The Dust Priests has raised mo
description: The Dust Priests has raised more of his kin.

name: The Dust King has unearthed an
description: The Dust King has unearthed ancient and hidden treasures. [Boots of Stone]

name: The Dust King has unearthed an
description: The Dust King has unearthed ancient and hidden treasures. [Dancing Shield]

name: The Dust King has unearthed an
description: The Dust King has unearthed ancient and hidden treasures. [Spirit Mask]

name: The Dust Priest has unearthed
description: The Dust Priest has unearthed ancient and hidden treasures. [Skull of Fire]

name: The Dust Priest has unearthed
description: The Dust Priest has unearthed magical gems.

name: The Dust Priest has found anci
description: The Dust Priest has found ancient tablets of power in the buried crypts!

name: The Dust priest has summoned m
description: The Dust priest has summoned monsters of the desert to his aid.

name: The Dust King and his High Pri
description: The Dust King and his High Priest have been defeated! In the Crypt, ancient treasures were found. [Skull of Fire]

name: Wolves have been heard, howlin
description: Wolves have been heard, howling at the moon

name: Wolves have been heard, howlin
description: Wolves have been heard, howling at the moon

name: Wolves have been heard, howlin
description: Wolves have been heard, howling at the moon, but nothing happens. HIDDEN

name: A large pack of werewolves hav
description: A large pack of werewolves have attacked!

name: It is whispered that an old cu
description: It is whispered that an old curse has awoken, calling those affected into the wilderness at full moon.

name: Werewolves have attacked!
description: Werewolves have attacked!

name: It is whispered that an old cu
description: It is whispered that an old curse has awoken, calling those affected into the wilderness at full moon.

name: Lately, dogs have gone rabid a
description: Lately, dogs have gone rabid and fled. A pack has now reappeared, mixed with more sinister creatures...

name: One of your commanders has bee
description: One of your commanders has been attacked by a rabid dog.

name: The wild beasts have grown in
description: The wild beasts have grown in number lately, coming near settlements and harassing travelers. Now a pack of wolves have attacked one of the villages, forcing the local defence to intervene. Some peasants have joined the soldiers.

name: The Tainted one has attracted
description: The Tainted one has attracted attention from otherworldly powers.

name: The Taint corrupts the body an
description: The Taint corrupts the body and mind! One of your commanders has developed strange cravings.

name: The Tainted one has attracted
description: The Tainted one has attracted attention from otherworldly powers.

name: The practice of blood hunting
description: The practice of blood hunting has brought the Taint upon one of your servants.

name: A mob has formed to oppose you
description: A mob has formed to oppose your blood hunters!

name: Opposition towards the ongoing
description: Opposition towards the ongoing blood hunting has provoked an attack on your servant!

name: There is opposition towards th
description: There is opposition towards the ongoing blood hunting. Someone has hired an assassin to get rid of your servant.

name: Your servant encountered a loc
description: Your servant encountered a local sect of fanatics. Their doctrine is to abstain from all pleasures of the flesh.

name: While blood hunting, your serv
description: While blood hunting, your servant stumbled upon a remote village where inhabitants have shielded innocent virgins from being caught.

name: When the daughter of one of th
description: When the daughter of one of the locals was claimed for the blood slave dungeons, her mother put a curse upon your servants!

name: One of your blood hunters fool
description: One of your blood hunters foolishly tried to summon a demon for his own gain.

name: One of your blood hunters has
description: One of your blood hunters has attracted the attention of a smallish demon who now follows his new master around. [Imp Familiar]

name: A rich merchant tried to bribe
description: A rich merchant tried to bribe one of your blood hunters, seeking to save his daughter from paying the blood tax. Your servant proved his loyalty and has delivered both the girl and the gold to the capital.

name: One of your blood hunters has
description: One of your blood hunters has become more attuned to the sanguine magic.

name: One of your blood hunters has
description: One of your blood hunters has used some of the virgins to make a contract with demons. [Lifelong Protection]

name: War has broken out among the l
description: War has broken out among the lords of the land. There is great turmoil and a large part of the population has been killed or fled.

name: A naiad court has been traveli
description: A naiad court has been traveling through the seas, celebrating summer. Growth and luck have increased but frolicking peasants have left the kelp untended, causing a fall in productivity.

name: An Ill Moon rises! People whis
description: An Ill Moon rises! People whisper in fear of the transforming curse of Lycanthropy. Wolves prowl the night, closer to the settlements of men than normal. Dogs go rabid, howling and barking madly at the baleful light in the sky.

name: Reset Ill moon. HIDDEN
description: Reset Ill moon. HIDDEN

name: PLACEHOLDER.
description: PLACEHOLDER.

name: Wolves have been heard, howlin
description: Wolves have been heard, howling at the moon.

name: Wolf/werewolf attack, no warni
description: Wolf/werewolf attack, no warning. HIDDEN

name: A group of tribesmen have atta
description: A group of tribesmen have attacked the province! Their leader seems to be under the influence of the Ill Moon. [Lychantropos' Amulet]

name: A group of tribesmen have join
description: A group of tribesmen have joined you! Their leader seems to be under the influence of the Ill Moon. [Lychantropos' Amulet]

name: Old tunnels dating from the ti
description: Old tunnels dating from the time of the first colony have been found. They lead deep into the earth but are blocked by massive amounts of ice. [Lake Urmia]

name: You leave the ancient tunnels
description: You leave the ancient tunnels alone. Best not to disturb their secrets.

name: The ice blocking the tunnels s
description: The ice blocking the tunnels seems to have magical properties. It would probably take a period of prolonged heat along with fire magic to melt it.

name: Your scholars have found recor
description: Your scholars have found records from the First Turan War, which denotes the years after the incursion of the caelians. It seems that the caelian seraphs located an Abysian temple of Fire hidden deep in the earth and used powerful magic to seal the passages leading to it.

name: A mage skilled in the path of
description: A mage skilled in the path of fire has arrived in the province. Will flames be able to melt the ice in the ancient tunnels?

name: Your mage has utilized the pow
description: Your mage has utilized the power of fire to melt the ice sealing the tunnels. Some ice has been removed, but not sufficiently to make meaningful progress. If the land itself was warmer, the heat of summer could perhaps be channeled into the tunnels to break the magical ice.

name: You have utilized the power of
description: You have utilized the power of fire to melt the ice sealing the tunnels. Some ice has been melted, but not sufficiently to make meaningful progress. If the land itself was warmer, the heat of summer could perhaps be channeled into the tunnels to break the magical ice.

name: The warmth of the land has bee
description: The warmth of the land has been channeled into the tunnels, melting the masses of ice. Ancient passages lead into the depth of the earth. Still, some ice remains. Also, the runes of warding inscribed on some of the walls of the tunnels have been deciphered. It seems the magic ice was not aimed at keeping out intruders from the tunnels, but rather at containing something within! Perhaps it would be unwise to melt the ice further...

name: The melting ice has formed int
description: The melting ice has formed into an elemental! This must be the remnants of some old defensive magic.

name: The melting ice has formed int
description: The melting ice has formed into an elemental, attacking the intruder! This must be the remnants of some old defensive magic.

name: The ice has been melted and pa
description: The ice has been melted and parts of the complex network of previously ice-filled tunnels explored. At some places there are wrecked bodies of winged beings, probably caelians. The remains bear traces of horrible burn-wounds. Strangely, there are no abysian bodies to be found. Will you take the time to carefully explore the tunnels or continue as fast as possible into the depths of the earth? Your scouts report there seems to be a way downwards, from which flows warm air.

name: A forgotten treasure vault has
description: A forgotten treasure vault has been found in the tunnels! [Charcoal Shield]

name: A magic item has been found in
description: A magic item has been found in the tunnels! [Ice Pebble Staff]

name: A magic item has been found in
description: A magic item has been found in the tunnels! [Frost Brand]

name: A magic item has been found in
description: A magic item has been found in the tunnels! [Rime Hauberk]

name: A nest of Cave Grubs has been
description: A nest of Cave Grubs has been exposed!

name: The cleared tunnels seem to co
description: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to caves used by those beings that dwell beneath the soil. Some of these monsters have strayed into the newly cleared passages! [Blacksteel Full Plate]

name: The cleared tunnels seem to co
description: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to caves used by those beings that dwell beneath the soil. Some of these monsters have now strayed into the newly cleared passages! [Spell Focus]

name: Your men advance into the dept
description: Your men advance into the depths. Rough cut passages lead leagues down into the crust of the earth. They end by the shores of a massive lake of magma and by those shores stand an ancient altar, eroded by the workings of time. If once again consecrated, perhaps it could be put to use again. [Magma Cave]

name: Your men advance into the dept
description: Your men advance into the depths. Rough cut passages lead leagues down into the crust of the earth. They end by the shores of a massive lake of magma. By those shores stand an ancient altar, eroded by the workings of time. If once again consecrated, perhaps it could be put to use again. [Magma Cave]

name: Sunken into the magma, a treas
description: Sunken into the magma, a treasure chest of enchanted stone has been found and skillfully retrieved! [Rod of the Phoenix]

name: The cleared tunnels seem to co
description: The cleared tunnels seem to connect to caves used by those beings that dwell beneath the soil. Some of these monsters have now strayed into the newly cleared passages! [Horror Helmet]

name: The Altar has been hallowed on
description: The Altar has been hallowed once more! [Altar of Catharsis]

name: Only a priest of ##godname## c
description: Only a priest of ##godname## can bless the altar.

name: Traces of sinister magic have
description: Traces of sinister magic have been found emanating from the altar.

name: Old records from the time of t
description: Old records from the time of the first colony have been studied and compared to new findings at the site. It seems that the altar is older than previously thought, perhaps even predating the arrival of the Abysians! It was apparently dedicated to the Purifying Flame. If a hidden altar of Catharsis since before the pollution of the Sacred Flame was found by the Abysian settlers, could this have been a reason for the Caelian campaign and the Turan wars? Would it be possible to rekindle the flame that was thought corrupted?

name: A being of flame has been summ
description: A being of flame has been summoned!

name: YOU DARE KINDLE THE FLAME THAT
description: YOU DARE KINDLE THE FLAME THAT IS MINE, AND MINE ALONE!? ...it seems the fire was not pure after all! A dark flame rises to punish your insolence... [Lantern Shield]

name: Anthrax gains gems and followe
description: Anthrax gains gems and followers

name: A being of flame has been summ
description: A being of flame has been summoned! HIDDEN

name: Anthrax has been banished!
description: Anthrax has been banished!

name: Hearing rumors of the sealed t
description: Hearing rumors of the sealed tunnels, a fire mage has come from afar to pledge himself to your cause and investigate the tunnels. [Dragon Sceptre]

name: A magical gateway has been fou
description: A magical gateway has been found. Inscriptions phrased in the Tongue of Hell describe the ritual of opening. Surely, whomever opens the Gate will be greatly rewarded by the Lords below! [The First Gate]

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! Your servant has been rewarded by the Princes of Hell.

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! Your servant has been rewarded by the Princes of Hell.

name: A Hero has tried prevent the G
description: A Hero has tried prevent the Gate from being opened!

name: The Gate has been studied by a
description: The Gate has been studied by arcane means and ancient lore. There are three of these portals and of increasing power. When opened, travel from the realms beyond is facilitated, making it easier for demons to manifest all across the world of men. The power of pure faith may be able to close the gates, or a master of blood magic could be able to harness their power. If further studied, some insights into the workings of the nether realms may be gained. However, it may be dangerous to linger near.

name: While studying the Gate, your
description: While studying the Gate, your servant has been approached by a limping man in a black coat. He offers power beyond belief if only the ritual inscribed on the gate is performed...

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! Your servant has been rewarded accordingly by the Princes of Hell.

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! Your servant has been rewarded accordingly by the Princes of Hell.

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! You have been rewarded accordingly by the Princes of Hell.

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! You have been rewarded accordingly by the Princes of Hell.

name: Dark magic has been used to op
description: Dark magic has been used to open the Gate! A reward of power was granted by the Princes of Hell, who have also sent a host to follow you in the upcoming war... [Horror Helmet]

name: There is war in Hell! Infernal
description: There is war in Hell! Infernal powers become manifest when the conflict spills over into the realm of men.

name: The heavenly law that keeps th
description: The heavenly law that keeps the nether realms apart from the realm of mortals has been broken! [The First Gate]

name: Something has shifted in the a
description: Something has shifted in the alignment of the Worlds! A flux of dark energy can be sensed through the heavenly spheres. This can only mean that one of the legendary gates to Hell have manifested in the realm of mortals! Woe to all, should it be opened![The First Gate]

name: Stars realign. The risk of War
description: Stars realign. The risk of War in Hell passes... HIDDEN

name: First Gate appears, for testin
description: First Gate appears, for testing, will happen only if forced. [The First Gate]

name: Oh, no! The Queen of the Garne
description: Oh, no! The Queen of the Garnet Amazon tribe has ambitions of conquest! HIDDEN [Oasis]

name: The Land of the Garnet Queen h
description: The Land of the Garnet Queen has been conquered and her palace claimed! Unfortunately, it seems most of the fabled riches of her abode have been squandered on wine and debauchery! As compensation, her slaves and virgin followers were taken.

name: The Garnet Queen comes to powe
description: The Garnet Queen comes to power. HIDDEN

name: The Garnet Queen is crowned. H
description: The Garnet Queen is crowned. HIDDEN

name: The Garnet Queen is fitted wit
description: The Garnet Queen is fitted with garments. HIDDEN [Blood Thorn]

name: The queen replenishes her slav
description: The queen replenishes her slaves.

name: The Garnet Queen is fitted wit
description: The Garnet Queen is fitted with garments. HIDDEN [Lifelong Protection]

name: Gryphon riders have been sight
description: Gryphon riders have been sighted flying over the land.

name: People speak in fear of the Qu
description: People speak in fear of the Queen of the garnet amazon that has come to power in a neighboring land. She is rumored to be unsurpassed in both beauty and cruelty!

name: Ferocious amazons have attacke
description: Ferocious amazons have attacked!

name: The amazons consolidate.
description: The amazons consolidate.

name: A devil joins. [Demon Whip]
description: A devil joins. [Demon Whip]

name: The garnet amazons have been d
description: The garnet amazons have been defeated! With her last breath, their priestess promised vengeance from her Queen upon your followers!

name: A Horde from Hell has been sen
description: A Horde from Hell has been sent to wreak havoc in your lands!

name: The garnet amazons have been d
description: The garnet amazons have been driven from the land! Some spoils of war have been transported to the treasury.

name: A devil joins. [Demon Whip]
description: A devil joins. [Demon Whip]

name: The amazons have organized a s
description: The amazons have organized a slave market. [Slave Market]

name: The amazons have organized a s
description: The amazons have organized a slave market. [Slave Market]

name: The Queen of the amazon has en
description: The Queen of the amazon has ensorcelled a barbarian Lord. [Slave Collar]

name: The barbarian is bestowed an i
description: The barbarian is bestowed an item [Fire Plate]

name: A Troll King gets ambitious!
description: A Troll King gets ambitious!

name: The Troll King has retrieved a
description: The Troll King has retrieved a magic item. [Vine Shield]

name: The Troll King has retrieved a
description: The Troll King has retrieved a magic item. [Dwarven Hammer]

name: The Troll Kings guard has retr
description: The Troll Kings guard has retrieved a magic item. [Vine Shield]

name: The Troll Kings guard has retr
description: The Troll Kings guard has retrieved a magic item. [Star of Heroes]

name: The Troll King has been defeat
description: The Troll King has been defeated! In his abode was found a treasure in gold and magic!

name: Trolls have been seen, skulkin
description: Trolls have been seen, skulking on the outskirts of rural settlements.

name: Trolls have attacked in force!
description: Trolls have attacked in force! [Midget Masher]

name: Trolls!
description: Trolls!

name: When the magic laboratory was
description: When the magic laboratory was demolished, a surge of mystical power wrecked the building. Some of those nearby have been afflicted.

name: When working on demolishing th
description: When working on demolishing the magic laboratory, someone unwisely stepped into a magic portal and disappeared.

name: When the fort was demolished,
description: When the fort was demolished, a forgotten treasure vault was found!

name: A tentacled monster has nested
description: A tentacled monster has nested in the area and is feeding on travelers. Locals demand that something be done! A patrolling force may be able to locate its whereabouts.

name: Your minions have located the
description: Your minions have located the lair of the monster, inside the broken belly of a sunken ship.

name: The Kraken seem to be guarding
description: The Kraken seem to be guarding its eggs. A mage skilled in water magic would perhaps make use of them.

name: Your forces attack the monster
description: Your forces attack the monsters nest in the sunken ship, trying to kill it or drive it away. [Ring of Regeneration]

name: The Kraken has been killed. It
description: The Kraken has been killed. Its lair in the Sunken Galley seems to yield magical gems, harvested from the empty skulls of its still chained oarsmen. [Sunken Galley]

name: The master of Water Magic has
description: The master of Water Magic has tamed the Kraken and made it roost the eggs. Its spawn will be under the control of the mage, even if the monster is left unchained.

name: The eggs of the Kraken are all
description: The eggs of the Kraken are all hatched and the mother has left its nest.

name: The Kraken has been angered!
description: The Kraken has been angered!

name: A Kraken egg has hatched and t
description: A Kraken egg has hatched and the monster crawling from it made to serve.

name: A Kraken egg has hatched but t
description: A Kraken egg has hatched but the monster crawling from it has attacked!

name: The amazon live in the desert
description: The amazon live in the desert and need supplies not to starve. [Endless Bag of Wine]

name: The barbarian drinks lots of w
description: The barbarian drinks lots of wine. [Endless Bag of Wine]

name: The amazon live in the desert
description: The amazon live in the desert and need supplies not to starve. [Endless Bag of Wine]

name: The amazon Queen gets reinforc
description: The amazon Queen gets reinforcements.

name: A magical gateway has been fou
description: A magical gateway has been found. It emanates evil power. [The First Gate]

name: The locals are conducting demo
description: The locals are conducting demon worship.

name: Demonic foreshadowing. HIDDEN.
description: Demonic foreshadowing. HIDDEN.

name: Entering a strange garden with
description: Entering a strange garden with fantastic creations made of human and animal bones, your servant was attacked when some of these came to life! [Garden of Bones]

name: A man has appeared, of whom it
description: A man has appeared, of whom it is whispered that age has steeped him in black wisdom â not lessened his powers of evil. He seeks to serve the one who sits on the Throne. [The Lower Throne]

name: While searching for magic site
description: While searching for magic sites in the forest, your servant encountered a troll!

name: While searching for magic site
description: While searching for magic sites in the forest, your servant angered a sprite by trampling some especially beautiful flowers!

name: While searching for magic site
description: While searching for magic sites in the forest, your servant encountered a strange creature!

name: While searching for magic site
description: While searching for magic sites in the forest, your servant encountered a wolf!

name: While traveling the mountains
description: While traveling the mountains in search for sources of magic power, your servant encountered a monster!

name: While traveling the mountains
description: While traveling the mountains in search for sources of magic power, your servant encountered a monster!

name: While traveling the mountains
description: While traveling the mountains in search for sources of magic power, your servant encountered a wolf!

name: While searching for sites of p
description: While searching for sites of power, your servant was beset by an undead!

name: One of your commanders has bee
description: One of your commanders has been lured away by a strange and fascinating light in the forest [Lantern Forest].

name: A mage has come to study the T
description: A mage has come to study the Thunder Oak. He has procured a permission from a local official to stay put and practice his arts in peace. He will serve you, but wishes to remain near the object of his studies. [Thunder Oak]

name: Some newly dead have disappear
description: Some newly dead have disappeared before being buried and fresh graves found excavated. People speak of black magic.

name: During a thunder storm, the ma
description: During a thunder storm, the mage has utilized a strokes of lightning converging on the Thunder Oak and created some magical servants!

name: During a thunder storm, the ma
description: During a thunder storm, the mage has utilized a strokes of lightning converging on the Thunder Oak and created a magic item! [Copper Plate]

description: Many have died from a strange disease. Some say it comes from demons infesting the flesh of mortals.

description: A horde of frenzied farmers have attacked the garrison. They seem raving mad! [Demon Whip]

description: The Dome of Solid Air has attracted some playful beings that seem fascinated by its magic. Some of them have been bound by a crafty mage.

name: People in the area speak of a
description: People in the area speak of a legendary swordsman living as a hermit in the forest.

name: Your servant has interrogated
description: Your servant has interrogated some peasants. They say that only one who is worthy can find the hermit -and who can be more worthy than one of the emperors bloodline?

name: While sleeping in the woods, t
description: While sleeping in the woods, the supposedly worthy one was approached by a celestial being in his dream. The being put a mark upon the forehead of the prince and claimed that an ordeal must be undertaken before the path to the Ancient Master will be revealed. Will you accept this challenge? Or could it be wise to consult one of the celestial masters first, bringing him here to investigate the spiritual energies of the forest?

name: During further meditation in t
description: During further meditation in the woods, the Prince was attacked by a Demon of Heavenly Fires!

name: It seems the Prince was not wo
description: It seems the Prince was not worthy! Perhaps he was not of the emperors blood after all. Perhaps another should be sent.

name: The Celestial Master has sense
description: The Celestial Master has sensed the divine energies emanating to this forest. The trial will be one of fire!

name: The blood of the emperor has p
description: The blood of the emperor has prevailed! After the battle, a path was found through a hidden ravine, leading to a secluded glen. There, in a simple hut, an Ancient Master was found sitting on his straw mat. He will offer his knowledge of the arts of war to your servants. Some may even be granted a glimpse of the celestial realm through his guidance. [The Ancient Master]

name: Under the tutelage of the Anci
description: Under the tutelage of the Ancient Master, your servant has glimpsed the Celestial realm!

name: Your servant has been proven w
description: Your servant has been proven worthy and won a gift from the Ancient Master. [Chi Shoes]

name: The young prince has been prov
description: The young prince has been proven worthy and received a sword from the Ancient Master. The blade sings when whirled through the air by his skilled hands. [Sword of Swiftness]

name: An enemy army approaches.
description: An enemy army approaches.

name: A enemy army approaches! The A

description: The Emperor has fallen ill! A master Alchemist must investigate this malady. To make matters worse, this is an omen of bad fortune and will upset the balance of the empire unless remedied.

name: The Emperor has died! Turmoil
description: The Emperor has died! Turmoil will follow!

name: The Alchemist has investigated
description: The Alchemist has investigated the Emperors malady. It is a grievous disease that can only be cured by a certain rare herb. This herb grows in swamplands and a skilled herbalist is needed to find and recognize it.

description: A superstitious lord has rooted out witches, wizards, mongrels, strangers and half-wits. All have been staked and left to desiccate on dry land. Magic has decreased and a substantial portion of the populace has been lost.

description: Undead have risen to wreak havoc in your lands!

name: Lately, farmers and merchants
description: Lately, farmers and merchants have disappeared when traveling one of the local mountain paths.

name: Your servant has discovered th
description: Your servant has discovered that a demon is eating travelers! When approached, the fiend proposed a deal: 'Let me feed on the fat merchants that pass this way and their gold will be sent to the coffers of the Emperor!'. If the deal is not struck, a ceremonial master could be sent to banish the demon, or armed men to slay it.

name: Your cunning servant has appro
description: Your cunning servant has approached the demon once again, inquiring about the suggested deal. When pressed, it seems the demon meant to send only the gold, keeping silver and other valuables from his victims! Since gold is scarce, the treasury would have been tricked of most of the proceeds. A new deal is now offered, where all gold, silver, copper and other valuables will be sent to the treasury.

name: Your agent has not been able t
description: Your agent has not been able to find out anything more.

name: A deal has been struck!
description: A deal has been struck!

description: A deal has been struck!

description: The Master of the Way has banished the demon!

description: The demon was angered by the shrill chanting and attacked in rage!

description: Your men attacked the demon with the aid of the local militia. It seems the creature heard the approaching soldiers and called on aid! [Boots of the Behemoth]

name: Unable to bear the Throne of A
description: Unable to bear the Throne of Ascension not being claimed by its rightful owner, the population of ##landname## pulled together a larger ceremony than ever attempted before.  Everyone in the province had to pray for the an entire month, but at last the Throne was claimed in the name of ##godname##.

name: The population of ##landname##
description: The population of ##landname## has never doubted who the real God and decided to show their devotion by performing a great ceremony to claim the Throne of Ascension in the name of ##godname##.  The ceremony was demanding and took weeks, but now everyone shall know that the Throne belongs to ##godname##.

name: It's a miracle, the Throne of
description: It's a miracle, the Throne of Ascension here has been claimed in the name of ##godname##.

name: Sneaking around with all those
description: Sneaking around with all those valuable gems has attracted unwanted attention from a group of thugs.

name: Sneaking around with all those
description: Sneaking around with all those innocent girls has attracted the attention of a pair of heroes.

name: Carrying around all those astr
description: Carrying around all those astral pearls has attracted the attention of a horror.

name: Sneaking around with all those
description: Sneaking around with all those magic gems has attracted the attention of a mad witch.

name: Attracted to the delicious nat
description: Attracted to the delicious nature gems, a giant spider suddenly emerged from the wood and attacked the commander!

name: Attracted to the delicious wat
description: Attracted to the delicious water gems, a huge but sneaky sea serpent suddenly attacked the commander!

name: Attracted to the death gems, a
description: Attracted to the death gems, a wandering spirit suddenly attacked the commander!

name: The moon has turned red and ma
description: The moon has turned red and magic is permeating the world. Astrologers and other Wise Men are most worried about these bad omens.

name: The moon is still red and the
description: The moon is still red and the sky is starting to get a sick red tone as well. The barrier that separates the horrors of the void from this world is growing thinner. Mages are advising utmost caution to avoid drawing the attention of any horrors. Performing any larger rituals powered by gems or pearls at this time would be foolish.

name: The entire sky has turned red
description: The entire sky has turned red and the barrier that separates the horrors of the void from this world is growing thinner. Mages are advising utmost caution to avoid drawing the attention of any horrors. Performing rituals powered by gems or pearls at this time would be very foolish.

name: The barrier that separates the
description: The barrier that separates the horrors of the void from this world is now gone and horrors are appearing frequently. The sky is still red, but that is not the greatest problem now. Mages are advising utmost caution and to avoid any highly populated area that horrors might enjoy. Performing rituals powered by gems or pearls at this time would be suicidal.

name: Powerful memories of the Almig
description: Powerful memories of the Almighty have escaped from the Throne of the Pantokrator. People are terrified and faith in the Pretender Gods has decreased. [The Throne of the Pantokrator]

name: A dormant decree of the Pantok
description: A dormant decree of the Pantokrator was activated when His Throne was disturbed. The decree has brought order to the world, but people are terrified and faith in the Pretender Gods has decreased. [The Throne of the Pantokrator]

name: A dormant decree of the Pantok
description: A dormant decree of the Pantokrator was activated when His Throne was disturbed. The decree has brought increased productivity to the world, but people are terrified and faith in the Pretender Gods has decreased. [The Throne of the Pantokrator]

name: A dormant decree of the Pantok
description: A dormant decree of the Pantokrator was activated when His Throne was disturbed. The decree has brought chaos to the world, people are terrified and faith in the Pretender Gods has decreased. [The Throne of the Pantokrator]

name: The Throne of Eternal Sufferin
description: The Throne of Eternal Suffering has reminded people of the importance of piety. Faith and order has increased worldwide. [The Throne of Eternal Suffering]

name: One night the moon was red as
description: One night the moon was red as blood, the next night it was blue as water and on the third night it was gone. Then on the seventh night the moon appeared once again, this time it was white.

name: People have died from a strang
description: People have died from a strange disease and soon after dark gems formed upon the corpses.

name: A forgotten curse suddenly too
description: A forgotten curse suddenly took effect and turned an entire village into Vine Men. The mindless apparitions are now spreading over the rest of the province.

name: Autumn come, the Ephoroi of th
description: Autumn come, the Ephoroi of the city have declared war upon the helote population.

name: The krypteion is under way. Wi
description: The krypteion is under way. Willful and strong helotes have been killed to prevent them from organizing and hundreds of helotes have been massacred throughout the city. The strict order of tyranny is restored in the city.

name: The krypteion has ended in a r
description: The krypteion has ended in a remarkable bloodshed. An exceptional Kryptes responsible for the deaths of several helote soldiers was elected and rewarded for his deeds.

name: The krypteion is under way. Hu
description: The krypteion is under way. Hundreds of helotes have been massacred throughout the city. The strict order of tyranny is restored in the city.

name: The krypteion has ended and th
description: The krypteion has ended and the bloodshed is over, for this year. An exceptional Kryptes was elected and rewarded for his deeds.

name: There is no Ephor in the city
description: There is no Ephor in the city to start the krypteion. The helote population is becoming unruly.

name: Suddenly part of the populatio
description: Suddenly part of the population was turned into some kind of horrors and started killing everyone!

name: Suddenly the Kraken eggs were
description: Suddenly the Kraken eggs were gone.

name: The Throne of Death has grown
description: The Throne of Death has grown quiet once again.

name: The peasants in a remote villa
description: The peasants in a remote village have become lazy and stopped toiling in the fields. When sent to enforce the order your bailiff discovered that the villagers gathered every nightfall inside an old barn. Inside the barn there was a great cauldron filled with a strange green broth. The farmers no longer needed to work the fields in order to feed their families. Your bailiff promptly confiscated the cauldron and flogged a couple of farmers. Rumors of the flogging has spread and farmers everywhere toil in earnest. [Enormous Cauldron of Broth]

name: The remote village in which yo
description: The remote village in which your bailiff found the strange cauldron has rebelled. Led by a strange woman of the woods the peasants attacked your bailiff and hung him from an oak. Bolstered by their savage bravery the lowlifes rallied other villages to their cause and within weeks a peasant army declared independence and attacked your province.

name: A death match competition is s
description: A death match competition is scheduled in the arena. The event will take place on the astral plane and the participants must leave now to get there in time. In addition to all the fame, the winner of the game will receive a powerful magic artifact. Each Pretender God may send one champion to the competition and any previous arena champion must try to defend their title. May the strongest man win!

name: The death match competition is
description: The death match competition is taking place. May the strongest man win!

name: The people's death match is sc
description: The people's death match is scheduled in the arena. Spellcasting is not allowed and all participants will get to borrow a slave collar to ensure they do not perform magic or run away. As this is the game for the common people, Pretender God and Disciples are not allowed to compete. Any Pretender breaking the rules will get to keep the slave collar. The event will take place on the astral plane and the participants must leave now to get there in time. In addition to all the fame, the winner of the game will receive a powerful magic artifact. Each Pretender God may send one champion and all old arena champions must try to defend their title, defying the rules if necessary. May the people's champion win!

name: The people's death match is ta
description: The people's death match is taking place. May the people's champion win!

name: Spring has come, and the winte
description: Spring has come, and the winter storms have passed. With the Hesperian Dragon bound by the mages of the empire, an expedition to the fabled gardens of the Hesperides is being organized.

name: The expedition to the fabled g
description: The expedition to the fabled gardens of the Hesperides was successful. The golden apples of immortality, the food of gods, were displayed for the cheering populace. One apple was given to the queen and transported to the laboratory.[Golden Apple]

name: The expedition to the fabled g
description: The expedition to the fabled gardens of the Hesperides has returned. The golden apples of immortality, the food of gods, were displayed for the cheering populace. Soon, however, the fraud was exposed and the charlatans were forced to eat their own fake apples, much to the enjoyment of the populace.

name: Upholding the ancient bargain
description: Upholding the ancient bargain the Gigantes of Black Korkyra have mustered their forces. A Lochos and his retinue has arrived to the Orichalcum Palace to pledge allegiance to the Queen.

name: A new Hydrophoros of the East
description: A new Hydrophoros of the East has been appointed in the capital. Her family was handsomely rewarded and there was much rejoicing.

name: A new Hydrophoros of the West
description: A new Hydrophoros of the West has been appointed in the capital. Her family was handsomely rewarded and there was much rejoicing.

name: The Hydrophoria was celebrated
description: The Hydrophoria was celebrated in the capital. Sacred water was carried from the temple grounds and sprinkled around the city, the water of the west cleansing that which is dead, and the water of the east bringing new life. Fertility and long lasting prosperity is expected and there was much rejoicing.

name: The Hydrophoros of the East wa
description: The Hydrophoros of the East was not present and the Hydrophoria could not be celebrated. People are concerned and there has been some unrest.

name: The Hydrophoros of the West wa
description: The Hydrophoros of the West was not present and the Hydrophoria could not be celebrated. People are concerned and there has been some unrest.

name: The Hydrophoroi were not prese
description: The Hydrophoroi were not present and the Hydrophoria could not be celebrated. People are concerned and there has been some unrest.

name: The Burning Mountain has erupt
description: The Burning Mountain has erupted sending shock waves throughout the kingdom. Thousands have perished in ash and flames. In the wake of the devastation the Laestrygonians have awoken and broken free. Enkelados the Laestrygonian monstrosity imprisoned underneath the volcano has returned to punish the gods for his imprisonment. [The Burning Mountain]

name: The Burning Mountain has erupt
description: The Burning Mountain has erupted sending shock waves throughout the kingdom. Thousands have perished in ash and flames. In the wake of the devastation the Laestrygonians have awoken and broken free. Enkelados the Laestrygonian monstrosity imprisoned underneath the volcano has returned to punish the gods for his imprisonment. [The Burning Mountain]

name: The Volcano has erupted sendin
description: The Volcano has erupted sending shock waves throughout the lands. Thousands have perished in ash and flames. Polybotes, the Laestrygonian monstrosity imprisoned underneath the burning mountain has returned to punish the gods for his imprisonment. [Volcano]

name: The Burning Mountain is rumbli
description: The Burning Mountain is rumbling. Throughout the land fearful tales are told of the giant monstrosities that wage war upon Gods. [The Burning Mountain]

name: The Burning Mountain is rumbli
description: The Burning Mountain is rumbling and lava has spilled forth. There has been widespread panic and people are fleeing the land while they still can. [The Burning Mountain]

name: A strange event involving a ro
description: A strange event involving a rooster, a lizard and three score silver coins resulted in a debate between Morgaine the Fay and ##targname##, a senior Crone of Avalon. ##targname## was intent on killing the basilisk, but Morgaine intervened and the quarrel escalated until the two of them unleashed their dweomer upon one another. When the whirling energies settled ##targname## had been muted for her inpudence. Several onlookers were cursed for the rest of their lives and unrest spread in the province.

name: An imprudent Mother of Avalon
description: An imprudent Mother of Avalon inquired Morgaine the Fay on her relations with Myrddin. A quarrel ensued and the poor Mother was turned into a pig. Rumors of the event spread in the province causing unrest.

name: Rumors of Myrddins presence le
description: Rumors of Myrddins presence led ##fulltargname## to the arcane laboratory of the province. She tried to capture the wizard, but the he unleashed vast powers, destroying the laboratory before escaping into the wild once more.

name: A young Mother of Avalon found
description: A young Mother of Avalon found a secluded cave and unwittingly entered. There she encountered Myrddin, who sealed the cave trapping her inside. The wizard gave her food and drink and found himself enjoying her company, discussing the arcane and the lore of the wild. Eventually he decided to let her leave the cave, but she chose to stay with him and was taught the secrets of the earth. Now ##targname## has become as reclusive as her lover and suspicious Crones observe her activities and travels.

name: An inquisitive Mother of Avalo
description: An inquisitive Mother of Avalon found rumors of Myrddins whereabouts. She sought him out to confront him, but ended up in his company, seduced him and made him teach her his arcane secrets. Now ##targname## has become as reclusive as her lover and suspicious Crones observe her activities and travels.

name: An inquisitive Mother of Avalo
description: An inquisitive Mother of Avalon found the forest in wich Myrddins was hiding. She sought him out to confront him, but found him strangely attractive in a wild way and the two of them became lovers. For a while they lived in the forest and Myrddin showed her the mysteries of the wild. Now ##targname## has become as reclusive as her lover and suspicious Crones observe her every move.

name: When Yngvar returned and pledg
description: When Yngvar returned and pledged his loyalty to the Awakening God the last remaining brothers of his former warband heard of his return and decided to follow him for one final campaign, the War of Ascension.

name: A flock of strange birds have
description: A flock of strange birds have attacked Piconye, as they do every summer.

name: ##profname## has sent out dele
description: ##profname## has sent out delegations to the false pretenders and rulers of the world to let them know of ##fullgodname##.

name: A messenger has arrived from a
description: A messenger has arrived from a distant land bringing a letter to your throne room: ##profname2##, by the power and virtue of ##godname2##,  let us rejoice in salvation and cross over to the end enriched by grace. It was announced to our majesty that you admire our excellency and that mention of our highness was made to you. So we are sending something about us to you through our delegate, because we wish to know if you hold the right faith like us and if you believe in the ##godtit2## through all things. We know that your little people of ##natname## hold you to be a god, while we recognize that you are mortal and subject to corruption. If you have need of anything for your pleasure from the customary abundance of our generosity, assure us that you follow the goodwill of ##godname2b## and you will obtain them. Receive the bishop in our name and make use of him, so that we might strengthen and reinforce our virtue mutually. If you truly wish to know the magnitude of the excellence of our highness, understand that I, ##profname2##, am Lord of Lords and exceeds all kings of the entire world in virtue, power and all the riches under heaven. And if you wish to come to our domain, we will set you up as a great and worthy guest of our home, and you will enjoy abundance which you will never have seen in your land. Remember your end and for eternity you will please the ##godtit2##.

name: One of the Yllerions has died
description: One of the Yllerions has died and his partner was seen flying east with a great host of lamenting birds. When she reached the sea she plunged herself into the waves and drowned herself. Soon afterwards the flaming eggs in their nest cracked open and two new Yllerion birds were hatched. The abbot sages has declared that it is time to once more call the Birds of Splendour.

name: One of the Yllerions has died
description: One of the Yllerions has died and her partner was seen flying east with a great host of lamenting birds. When he reached the sea he plunged himself into the waves and drowned hirself. Soon afterwards the flaming eggs in their nest cracked open and two new Yllerion birds were hatched. The abbot sages has declared that it is time to once more call the Birds of Splendour.

name: Bilqis, known in foreign lands
description: Bilqis, known in foreign lands as the Queen of Na'Ba, has established contacts with a foreign king. Praising him for his widsom and giving him extraordinary gifts from the Vault of Incense and Marvels she was in return showered in gold and gems.
